Title: The Price of Happiness
Synopsis:
This is a world that was once destroyed. Humanity's population has been drastically reduced as a result of a catastrophe over 300 years ago. Fourteen clans had to rebuild this world with the remaining scraps: Kamazu, Betances, Harrakan, Gresior, Vaschenko, Schreiber, Nejem, Chaudhary, Thakin, Yuan, Mori, Zakai, Furrer, and Jin. Over 300 years later, humanity has re-learned the meaning of peace. Joshua Gresior is someone born during this period of peace.
Joshua has the life that everyone wishes they could have. A young genius talented in martial arts, magic, and the STEM fields. He is recognized by the Fourteen Great Clans as a prodigy that appears once every few generations. He will be the 7th head of the Gresior clan, an auspcious number. His life has been blessed since the moment of his birth and will continue to do so. However, he does not know what was the price behind his happiness. If he did, he would have surely wished that he never lived such a blessed life. 
If only he knew what was the price.
 
 
*Note: so this story will actually take a while before any of the real story starts, I need to do some world building and introduce the  characters since the setting is actually quite complicated. I actually planned out the story ahead of time because this is what happens when you get bored during class and there is nothing to do: you write a random story (or at least what I do). My friends actually saw some parts of it and suggested I actually write it so why not. Don't worry, it won't be like a giant information dump, I plan to make it as easy as possible to understand. FAIR WARNING: I put a tragedy tag for a reason *

Title: Reign
Synopsis:
Life lost its meaning to Ramsey. The gears of the cruel system squeezed him dry, and he took matters into his own hands. But the supposed end did not come for him. Instead, he was granted power. And with this newfound power, he will make the world kneel.
[I do not own the cover page]

Title: Through the Gateway of Doubt
Synopsis: 17-year old Selah Rotavelle always wanted to be a queen, but with her mother against her and her sister in line for the crown, she has little hope except for marrying into another family. But when a king from the South offers a marriage proposal to her father Selah becomes suspicious. After investigating she runs away to another land with the help of a friend and magic. But little does she know that the marriage arrangement is part of something bigger that just an alliance.

Title: Mark Of P
Synopsis:
There was once a time of blood and war,
Their the soldiers died, as the nobles saw,
But that time had ended,
Peace took its place, the continent's wounds mended,
They established their nation,
It grew huge and prospered to their wild elation,
All because of multiple heroes through the ages,
They fought like warriors, they spoke like sages,
Their magic was strong they were the main leads 
They were their to help, as they grew its seeds
They all had one thing in common, you see
They all bore the Mark of P

Title: Kingdom Come: Archemi Online Chronicles Vol.3
Synopsis:
Kingdom Come is the third book in the Archemi Online Chronicles, a LitRPG Epic Fantasy series starring a dragon and her pet rider.
***DRAGON SEED IS FREE ON AMAZON BETWEEN 16TH-21ST APRIL 2019***
 
Kingdom Come (Archemi Online #3)
As reward for stopping a serial killer and restoring the Kingdom of Vlachia to its rightful ruler, Dragozin Hector and his queen dragon, Karalti, have earned a noble title, a castle, and land of their own.There’s only one problem – it’s occupied. By a freaking elder vampire.Not only has the vampire unleashed the blight of undeath across the land, but a crazed ex-developer is on the warpath. His mission? To take Hector’s dragon, free the Void Dragons, and use their combined power to become the Dragon-God Emperor of Archemi.Hector never wanted to go back to war, not even in a video game. But now, he must fight to claim his territory from Ol’ Fangface before everything is taken from him - including his beloved dragon.
You can pre-order Kingdom Come on Amazon here: Kingdom Come on Amazon.
 
Previous Installments in the Series:
 
Dragon Seed (Archemi Online #1)
What would you give to be a dragon rider?
Before being conscripted to fight in the Total War, Private Hector Park had a shattered family, a collection of old videogames, and a promising career as a motorcycle stuntman. Now, he is dying from a virus threatening humankind with extinction. He has three days to live.When Hector’s brother contacts him after years of hostile silence, Hector goes to try and make peace. But his brother has an offer even more unbelievable than reconciliation: the chance to cheat death by joining him in Archemi, a full-immersion fantasy VR-RPG videogame. Determined to forge a life worth living, Hector undergoes the experimental upload process and chooses the difficult path of the Dragon Knight. To achieve his dream, he must prove himself worthy of imprinting a dragon, a being with whom he will share a telepathic bond more intimate than any human relationship.But at what cost?
This book is live on Amazon: click here to go to Amazon 
 
 
Trial by Fire (Archemi Online Book #2) is the sequel to Dragon Seed, the first book in the Archemi Online LitRPG/Gamelit series. It is largely standalone, but I highly recommend reading Dragon Seed first!
One man. One game. One adorable baby dragon.
Two weeks ago, Hector Park cheated death by uploading his mind to the ultra-immersive fantasy RPG game, Archemi. After exposing the rotten heart of an order of dragon knights, he’s now on the run with a young queen dragon who could one day become the most powerful mount in the game.
To get strong enough to face their enemies, they need a quest – a big one. Fortunately, trouble has a way of finding Hector, and it does – in the form of a series of brutally murdered priests, a king in desperate need of a hero, and a beautiful, fiery berserker. The risk? Huge. The payoff? More gold than a dragon’s hoard.
There's only one problem - Archemi is haunted by the ghost of a mad developer bent on making the game his personal playground. And now that the world outside has vanished in a storm of nuclear fire, there's no one left to stop him. Or at least, that’s what he thinks. Because Hector isn't the kind of man to take this shit lying down, and neither is his dragon.
You can find Trial by Fire here: Trial by Fire on Amazon

Title: Starlight Assassin
Synopsis:
Set in the city of Valeris, the Starlight Assassin is a fantasy adventure following a young man and his adventures with strange occurrences and people in the city. Dark things lurk around every corner; not everyone is strong enough to survive unscathed.
Edit: Short  Permanent hiatus.
Author's note:
Traumatizing content tag exists for creative freedom in future chapters and because I don't know exactly what content is traumatizing. Blood and swearing will be present. No sexual content whatsoever.
I really have no idea how to sum up everything properly, and even if I could, I feel I would rather have you dive in without any expectations.

Title: Fast Food in Another World
Synopsis: On his way back from a supermarket, Aili gets summoned to a medieval-like world. No cheat like ability, no overwhelming power, no big bad demon lord either. Instead, using his superior intelligence and 500 years of additional human evolution, Aili sets out to do the only thing he can - introducing the ignorant people of Jarenbourg to the greasy goodness that is the fast food of the 21st century.

Title: Nightmare
Synopsis:
The world changed abruptly. 
 
Zombies attacked out of nowhere. It was as if they appeared out of thin air,
There was no warning, no signs that the world was about to change.
Only death and carnage awaits.

Title: Trials of Humanity
Synopsis:
Marrcus had always been diffrent, even from a young age.He could never understand others adversion to killing,Yeah just walking up to someone and stabbing them for no reason is a dick move but if someone truly deserves it ( such as a rapist or child molester ) why shouldn't they kill them? But as he got older he relised that others didn't understand or agree with his way of thinking and would persecute him for it. So he hid it, shoveing it to the back of his mind and caging it like a beast. As he went through life he grew complacent and lazy but ever was he waiting, waiting for the day in which he could finally be himself and let the beast free.
 
This is my first story and to be honest my vocabulary and spelling will probably suck.This isn't suposed to be a fanfic but I added the tag just incase.As I am a busy person this has no real release schedual you may get one chapter a month you may get fifty.Also this is going to be partaly reader interactive in the begging so thanks for that.

Title: Haela-Magi
Synopsis:
The kingdom of Kregloa is on the brink of war. To prepare, men are drafted into becoming soldiers. Some unfortunate men, were randomly selected to go to Reachan Training Ground, in the northernmost province of Kregloa. It is cold, and the survival rates are incredibly low.
Kyra is only thirteen when he gets drafted as a soldier and is randomly selected to go to Reachan Training Ground. Any boy in his position would curse the gods, but Kyra looks toward the future with excitement and anticipation. He makes friends, and grows in the camp, learning how to fight with both magic and physical weapons.

Title: "Let's play hiding"
Synopsis:
Town's people feel uncomfortable and say " Can't we move it to far place from here? Children don't realize and might play on it. If there's so bad energy then why don't we get rid of it? " But no one touched that, years passed... 
 
I like a horror movie and stories. I wrote this "Let's play hiding" in February 2015 on Mongolian language, and now I wanna let you know what I wrote. Also you can fix my grammar faults.

Title: The Earthians
Synopsis: Division and hatred continue to plague the world. A new superpower emerges, and a great war is imminent. A group of eight people awakens to a terrifying prophecy. These eight must unite the world and prepare all of its peoples for the prophecy. Will they succeed or will they succumb to the impending doom? Or will the disunity and wounds of society end it first?

Title: Refining the Heavens
Synopsis:
[A.K.A. Kairos Astroire & the Snowdrifts]
Kairos, a poor village boy, was born in a warring state without a decent shred of cultivating talent. In a world of Ki and Magic where only the mighty will rise while the weak are trodden upon, the Empire judges one’s potential in the academy. Fated to be expelled and starve on the streets, his struggles only turned him into the perfect stepping stone for his affluent aristocrat classmates. When an ancient enemy of humanity awoken during an assessment, life took a turn for the worst... Until he unlocked the power to refine any cultivation manuals and seized fate in his own hands. 
Since the heavens bore down cruelly, then why not refine the heavens?

Title: The Supreme Cultivator
Synopsis:
This story is a parody for xianxias, and some litRPG, where our protagonist, Bòhé chá, faces no problems at all in his life controlled by the evil author... Is the author actually evil? (This is not a rhetorical question, I'm actually curious.)
 
PS : this is only written as a method of wasting time, so don't expect me to upload regularly.
Edit : removed the LitRPG and replaced it with Satire since that is more accurate.

Title: Rotan's Shaman: Arushta
Synopsis:
Born in the Maroon Hill near Ehlnofey, Arushta was just a starving youngling when picked up by a travelling con-man for his unique ability. For two pins of cooper, Arushta would tell your fortune. For three, he would castrate your pig. For a good meal, he'd don an Akavirian horn-wood and lay a curse upon your enemy. 
Not long after Arushta realise he has too much for his own. He started giving away gold coins for the ones in need, for a piece of their soul.

Title: Darkstorm: Book One of The Rhenwars Saga Preview
Synopsis: Faced with an imminent cataclysm that will destroy the magical heritage of their people, a secret conspiracy of mages has resorted to harnessing the powers of Hell to save their legacy. The only mages who can oppose them are Braden and Quin Reis: two brothers with a turbulent past and a caustic relationship. But both Braden and Quin are compromised, harboring terrible and tragic secrets.Will Braden and Quin be able to prevent the unsealing of the Well of Tears? Or will they fall victim to the darkmages’ sinister manipulations and join their conspiracy?

Title: Mega fantasy
Synopsis:
What happen when a big fan of Megaman got transformed as one of the characters of the saga?, see what happen when the dream of a fan becomes reality, go to different worlds with ciberpunk and fantasy settings,  come and see what this fan do to the worlds he go after he got the powers of his character and more.
Warning: This story can have spoilers of some games, so if you are a Megama fan and never played the games of saga Zero and ZX (basically if you lived in a cave) better not read this story
 (The cover is not mine and I don't take owner ship of the image)

Title: Wage Your War
Synopsis:
Mirabel is reborn into a world on the cusps of a new age. A world where the common whisper words of dissent against the rulers, a world where some nobles greed and some advocate for the lowly, where magic exists. In the midst of chaos, Mirabel seeks to win the game she was thrown into, battling monsters and men alike. 
The kingdoms rage war against each other while the gods plot amongst themselves, bringing destruction and death to their worlds. For survival, glory, greed, revenge or amusement; come and wage your wars.

Title: Deus ex Aliis Mundi
Synopsis:
Earth is gone yep. It's gone and all the humans (apologies to all the fluffy animals) have been transported to a new world to entertain the gods. Tommie just wants to find his family in this new world where fantasy comes to life and humans are little more than snacks to the inhabitants.
 
Note: I've just finished rewriting chapters 3-5 and will be leaving the old versions there for a few days before i delete them. A lot of the content has changed so I would recommend reading the new versions, even if you've already read them.

Title: Empath
Synopsis:
Life at the Institute is good. Everyone is well taken care of. Weekly trips to medical and a daily dose of medication mean that no one gets sick much. Plus, there's always something to do. Scheduling makes sure no one has a moment to be bored. Empaths are special, so none of the human staff mind putting the work in. People get moved around sometimes, depending on how old they are. It's sad to be separated from friends, but it makes sense. No point housing little kids with women, or older boys. Sometimes you might miss someone. It's okay, though. You still see your old friends sometimes; and the Institute is better than outside. Outside, people hurt empaths. That's why the Intstitute has so many guards. 
Nobody quite knows what happens once you become an adult. Everyone gets moved somewhere. It must be to a different Institute. It's probably nice there, too.

Title: Mother
Synopsis:
New Future Academy, refurbished and reopened! Students from all across the country are being sent invitations. The smartest and brightest students are being offered an opportunity to work together towards a better future! A New Future! Definitely nothing will go wrong and there is definitely nothing suspicious about it! 
 
...
 
...ignore those tags...
 
Inspired by Danganronpa and mystery stories in general.

Title: 六つの親和力(Muttsu no Shinwaryoku)
Synopsis:
This series is currently on hiatus due to certain reasons. 
 
Alternate title: The 6 Affinities
In the year 2040,  a massive earthquake lead to the discovery of an unknown structure in the depths of the Pacific Ocean. With humanity’s decision to explore the structure a crystal was uncovered later to be named the Akashic Records. This lead to the discovery of magic and humanity’s past with it. Countries later set-up academies to teach students with magical affinity.
 
20 years later, Akisada Hiroshi a newly enrolled student into one of such magical academies aims to be the strongest mage in the world, gifted with the rare trait of having affinities to all fields of magic.
 
Authors: Gerrage, Koyuki
Illustrator: Gerrage
Koyuki's website: https://koyukioriginal.wordpress.com/muttsu-no-shinkwaryoku/

Title: The Hero Beside You
Synopsis:
Ryder was chosen by the goddess, Selene to be a hero to save the world to which Ryder graciously replied with a simple "F**k no!". With little to no choice, the goddess went with her second choice, Regis, Ryder's best friend. Now Ryder has to follow Regis on an epic journey to make sure his goodwill friend doesn't get himself f**king killed.
 
"Sometimes the real heroes in life are the ones who walk beside us"-Some high guy at the park

First story so you WILL see an almost literal shit ton of grammar errors.

Title: Transmigration Retiree
Synopsis:
"What's that you say? I can never leave this reality ever? Good!" 
 
Ed, was a normal man in a world full of superheroes, so he didn't really have too many complaints when that first truck fell on him. After all he'd read enough comics to know that sometimes things just happen. Besides he'd been getting on in years when it happened, and his life till then, though lonely, had more or less been fully lived. 
The second time around when that one guy pushed him off a cliff for a chalice of immortal ambrosia, wasn't so cool though, and then there was that third time when he was just getting used to life as a lady, and that crazy goddess showed up out of nowhere and started ranting about purging the demon menace....then some other stuff happened and he briefly got to go back to earth before falling into a coma where he adventured in the world of dreams. 
Then the aliens came, and the dream ended and he was suddenly stuck being the AI Overmind for the whole damn star systm. The aliens died, and because he was all mechanical and what-not he just kind of had to keep on going. 
Forced to continue collecting the materials and data from countless worlds that were destoryed in the process.  
Then there was that whole war with the gods business that followed...mostly because of all that world destroying he did because of some fairly faulty programming.
Anyway, thankfully someone pulled a "rocks fall" on that whole curfuffle, because by the time he was in control of himself again, things had long gotten out of hand. 
Now the powers-that-be tell him that he must spend the rest of his existence in single lonely section of the cosmos. Trapped in a single portion of a single universe. And now he weeps...No worries though, these are tears of joy. 
 
Hopefully this final unending existence he's been given will be the quiet life he's been looking for. 
 

A Man who's seen everything gets abducted by aliens and is converted into an AI that sits at the helm of a fleet of alien ships and behind the computer systems for most their planets. This Alien AI goes to war with the gods and ends up nearly destroying an entire reality. The Angels condemn the troublemaking AI to life as normal child on a far off world....All truth said, the "AI" couldn't be happier. His life's been far too interesting(read: Scary, Inconvenient and Painful) in his opinion and he could do with a bit of normalcy.

Title: Chronicles of Magnus Stone
Synopsis:
Chronicles of Magnus Stone
My name is Magnus Stone. I’m going to tell you about the end of the world. It wasn’t a nuclear apocalypse, a zombie outbreak, or even global warming that ended the world. It was something only the geeks and nerds of the world ever dreamed of. The world became a game.

Author's Note:
This is a story idea I had while writing some chapters for my other story "Tales of a Dwarf-Lord". It wouldn't leave me alone, so I just started writing it. Hopefully it is interesting. It is largely inspired by "The Legend of Randidly Ghosthound" by puddles4623. Which I am currently reading. If you haven't read it, do so now.

Title: Reincarnated as a Pillbug monster
Synopsis: After an unexpected end, he found himself in a room of light.And before he know it, he found himself reincarnated as a monster...Weak and alone in a hellish landscape,can he survive in this new world,that is still in its infancy ?

Title: Devil Princess Reincarnation
Synopsis: Of the Pine Family’s five children, Olivia Pine Fredirin was the most unremarkable. Born to a Ducal House in the Fredirin Kingdom, she was a naïve, sweet and timid girl. The type that’s completely unsuited to the hard world of royal politics.However, half the truth is often a whole lie and only children and fools would believe what’s meets the eye. Olivia’s entire persona was fake, manufactured out of necessity. A way to maintain her life until her body grows strong enough to house her true soul.Now, after seven years of waiting, she has finally awakened.

Title: Tristan the Black Mage
Synopsis:
A young high school boy who is unhappy with his existence becomes a great black mage in a fantasy world of magic and swords.
Join him on his rebirth and on his journey to becoming the greatest black mage of all time. 
 
 
 
New chapters will come out three times a week.

Title: Aeroth: The Arrival of the Beasts
Synopsis: A young man makes his way to his first Wizarding Trials where he will face the expectations placed upon him by his bloodline. However, unbeknownst to him, darkness is brewing to north of Aeroth, and he takes it upon himself to investigate the oncoming forces.

Title: The White Dragon
Synopsis:
From north came danger, as we knew it would: In the Vanguard of winter, a dragon dance Unraveled the land, until out of the forest, Out of the plains they came, from the mothering earth, The sky unreckoned before them.
Nine there were, under the three moons, under the autumn twilight: As the world declined, they rose beckond by his call, they came to his side to proect that which was left.
For the hero of the light, fights the Darkness of that He Who Is.

Title: Dungeon Universe
Synopsis: Cliche start of an alien race using humans as entertainment, but hopefully I can branch off into a more original role

Title: The Prophecy
Synopsis:
Time passes just like a breeze.
A once beloved king, turned tyrant.
A once noble character turned villainous.
 
Millennia has passed since the seal of the Dragons,
In the shadow, a plan is brewing to once again free the Dragons of old.
 
Yet at the silver of hope, a prophecy was once again rekindled by the people, a prophecy who would protect them for days to come.

Title: The Justicars
Synopsis:
In a world where villainous dictators reign, crime is at an all-time high, and the unjust is common place, five otherwordly heroes arrive to right wrongs and serve justice! The power lies on their side, however, as their superhuman abilities allow them to dish out punishment to all evil-doers, all the while looking remarkably dashing doing so!
Yet with great power, comes great responsibility, and as these ambitious youths will come to find, to have the fate of the world resting in your hands is not as easy as the caped men and women of fiction will have you believe! 
But they shall never falter, for in a world of evil, the Justicars will let it be known that justice always prevails.

Title: I wanna be a gamer!
Synopsis:
E-sports or electronic sports became the most popular sport in recent years, many games started to emerge and the most populaone? LoH(Legend of Heroes) it was firts release in 2017 and by 2019, 99.9% of the pro gamers all around the world form teams to play LoH.
Of course all of this was unrelated to me,Alex summer. I am a university student, 19 years all, nothing more to say i think. i have a very normal life or boring life whatever you wanna call it but one day my whole world change with just one frase:
-"Hey alex lets play LoH!"
Very simple right? but the biggest things sometimes start like this
this is a story about a dream, my dream
I WANNA BE A GAMER!

Title: Skull
Synopsis:
Otus buys the first VRMMO 'World'. Find out what happens on his adventure.
 
 
This is my first story please give me tips on how to improve my grammar.

Title: Slivers of Mastery
Synopsis: A Banker. A Succubus. Teacher. Lover. Friend.Follow the adventures of Tony as he befriends a demon, learns wisdom in the face of adversity and becomes a beacon of hope in a changed and terrifying world.

Title: Dragon storm: Beginning.
Synopsis:
Many years into the future, science has been tasked with finding an alternate mehtod of transportation. Fossil fuels have dried up, much faster than the world had planned. Anarchy had begun to reign across the planet. However, one team of scientists, fueled by fantasy and imagination, came up with a plan. From that plan came an idea and from that idea, the first dragon was born.
A couple centuries beyond the first birth, the dragon wars had destroyed most bastions of civilization. Technology was all but gone from the world. All that was left was to live your life as best as you can. It is here that we join our main character, James, on his road through life. It all begins on his birthday, the day he is considered an adult by empirical standards. At the age of 16, he gets his own salvage liscence and begins to make his own way in life.
Little does he know, the first time he goes out to the claim his grandfather gifted him for his birthday, he would find something that would change the world. Join James as he goes forward on adventures, fights an evil that surrounds him and perhaps even finds love along the way. Perhaps he will even find the answers to questions he has been asking all his life.
 
 
I hope you guys enjoy this story and any feedback is always really really appreciated. This is my second try to finish this story and it has been swimming in my head since I was only thirteen years old. I hope it writes as well as it has always been in my head. Note, I do not own the rights to the cover picture. It was find via a random search on pinterest for dragon pictures.

Title: Harems are only for wimpy guys?
Synopsis: When an ill tempered and bossy girl forces you to like otaku culture and unintentially starts a harem for you, guess the only thing for you to do is to go along with it.

Title: Learning Magic
Synopsis:
An Invincible Body Cultivator named Alvin is offered a deal to be transported to a world of Swords & Magic. He, who had already reached the peak of power in his world and was bored as hell happily accepted the deal. 
What will happen when a being with unmatched physical prowess aspires to be a Mage?
How much chaos will his arrival bring upon this new world? Will it be the beginning of a new legend or another laid-back story? Only time will tell......
But........Is this world the end of Alvin's journey?

Title: Valour Sect Chronicles
Synopsis: A chronologically and factually accurate recounting of crucial points in the temporal flux that consequentially resulted in the events that transpired during the Galian Calendar Year 3281.

Title: Travel guide of Null City
Synopsis:
Null City, the place that's placed as the very origin of every map. 
 
It's impossible spatiology have made it a perfect place for wonders from many dimensions, worlds and beyond to concentrate in here. 
 
Used to be a forbidden place to come in, now we have been gained permission to conduct a first-ever tourist trip around the city, with it infinite wonder and mystery.
 
As you might expect, it would be near-impossible to travel to all of the place. So we have made the guide to mark the best place to come visit with your time in here.
 
As always, hope you enjoy this trip, and be sastified with our service - Infinite Wonder Tourism Agency.

Title: Master of Jade Cauldron
Synopsis:
A youngster was born in the year where the luckiest fate and the inauspicious date clashed together.In this Continent of Yan, Li Long Feng spend his first ten years growing up as a filial son, trying his best to be enrolled into the Pill Hall to provide a better life for his mother who lost her husband since Long Feng was five.
 
Unknowing to himself, Long Feng possessed a born innate constitution of Jaded Lingzhi of Knowledge, or also known as the mind of the Emperor of Five Grains, Emperor Shennong.
 
Notes: I recently returned back to writing. so the chapters might be slightly bad in the first earlier chapters. will return back to the top quality soon.
 
I have no editors and each chapter is written and edited by myself, hopefully, it's good enough for a good read.

Title: Broken Cheat
Synopsis:
Matthew Hill is a young man that lost both his mother and father to an accident. He has been living modestly with the money his parents left behind, but he can achieve something greater, if he only wishes for it. This is a story spanning many worlds and universes.
 
The MC will be OP, this is the first fiction i make so please tell me if i have any mistakes or if i should change anything.
inspired by Dex/clairs adventure and micheal ammers

Title: Made Of Mana
Synopsis:
Callixtus Marrington, the Archwizard of the city of Trine, has finally done what no mortal has done before. He created a being made completely out of mana! And all it took was enough mana to destroy a city and a tiny bit of murder. With his dream fulfilled Callixtus would like nothing more then to raise this child of mana  and die a happy death. But the kingdom is sick of the arrogant wizards and the king is gathering his soldiers, but who cares its not like those magic less peasants can do any thing.
WARNING: FIRST FIC I HAVE EVER WRITTEN.

Title: Vast Sea
Synopsis: An announcement caused a major panic... However, it was for good since it was a warning. Alien invasion happened, but everyone manage to defeat them by using arts of magic and superpowers taught and gained from the aliens who want peace. However, the aliens who wanted peace was killed by humans. No one knows why, but there is one thing they know they were cursed." You will take forms of a mythical creatures." Long time ago, that people had found a way to seal their mythical forms. After many years, people forgotten that they have that curse.A girl named Venus Celestine wanted to be an idol and a singer, she was great at singing and have talent on dancing, however she has one problem, she doesn't care what she look like. After many auditions, she passed one, but there was one mistake. She was put in an idol boy group?!

Title: Destiny Upheaval(TRIAL)
Synopsis: A person from earth reincarnated into a child of another reality, one day he saw his 'future'. This is a journey where our MC struggle against destiny and hardships but of course with future knowledge cheat but with as little plot armor as possible .

Title: Void God Emperor [2]
Synopsis:
This is a rewrite of the original story, completely different from the original story.
 
The World shook as a legend was born. In one hand he held a mysterious sword, killing his enemies with one slash. In his other hand he held a mysterious flame, he called Void. With those two he ruled over the heavens, capturing his enemy's territory.
 
However everybody wondered, Who was he?

Title: New World Switch
Synopsis:
It's not easy for any of them.  It never will be.  But they'll have to get used to it.  There's no way back to their world.  The parts of their life they were so intertwined with, allowing them to connect and create, are gone.  They can no longer use the magic of their world since they are not of that world anymore.  All 7 million of them are no longer in that world, and instead, they are in ours, but we have no since disappeared.
 
***
Basics of this story, if the synopsis wasn't enough, (Their world was full of magic, they're transported to our world [present day], everyone loses their ability to use their magic, they have to live in our post-apocalypse world).\
This story is basically a collection of short stories in the same universe which will feature a new cast of characters and occasionally reoccurring ones.  The chapter distribution will be based on how much I have to say on that story, but some will naturally be longer than others.  The idea is that I give options for who the next story focuses on and people can vote on which story they want to read next.

Title: The Taboo Entity
Synopsis:
Within the vast universe, a single cell appeared out of nowhere. An asteroid flew by and carried that cell as it travel through the universe.
Ten million years later, an asteriod entered the atmosphere of a planet, accidently landing within a green lake.
Ten thousand year later, the green lake turned into an azure lake. 
A hundred years later, an enormous flower bud appeared at the center of the lake.
Ten years later, the flower bloomed.
 
Schedule: Indefinite. When I'm bored or not busy.

Title: The fool's paradise (dungeon novel)(complete)
Synopsis:
A twisted man who Lives for a third time finds himself reincarnated as a dungeon core.
He wasn't born twisted, but living several lives tends to do that, now he just wants to have fun and maybe get some answers, however, greedy adventurers, ambitious leaders, and craving mages won't give him time to catch his breath as he has to balance defending himself, and coming to terms with his new form that is further twisting his mind. 
Author's note. This novel is completed with 851 pages and is now in the editing phase, it may be slow as I might start a new novel, so expect horrific chapters in the beginning.

Title: Adamant Doom
Synopsis:
It was supposed to be a dull rival villainess reincarnation story, seeing that nobody died and the world's fate was not at stake. 
I, as the villainess, planned to just let the Heroine get whoever man she want and go on about my life. My heart won't be broken if I never befriended any of the capture target. I won't fall in love if I avoided them except for unavoidable events, fixed from the dating game's story. When all was said and done, I would return to my daily life and the others to theirs. Then the plot could be ended up with nobody getting hurt. 
Yet—
The 'game' hasn't ended. 
It was merely a lighthearted initiation of something bigger. At least that's what she said. 
Furthermore, this 'something bigger' has the world's at stake, and everybody possibly will die.

Title: Protector
Synopsis:
Ying and Yang are currently fighting for dominance in another realm. The clash of their power is so immense that it ripped time and space apart in nearby realms. 
Nikolas Blesi fell through one of these tears between realms and ended up in a fantasy themed one. For 200 years Nik conquered this world with the aim of returning home. After many years of secluded training, Nik managed to open his own tear between realms. 
Watch Nik as he attempts to live on Earth once again.

Title: The Kingdom of One (Hiatus)
Synopsis:
My name was ordinary. My face was ordinary. My body was ordinary. My live up till now was nothing but ordinary.  My everyday routine was nothing but ordinary. I lived a truly ordinary life. My job was ordinary. My ambitions and goal for the future were also ordinary. My skills and knowledge were ordinary. I was nothing but ordinary.
But one day I did something out of ordinary which changed my life. I died and was brought to another world. This world was nothing like the fantasy worlds I had always read about. It was truly a harsh world. And in this world I've promised myself to do everything but ordinary. 
I shall do the extraordinary, I shall resolve me heart and dare to do the impossible.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________
 
Author's note: Writing a story is like giving birth to a child. Even though it was your work that brought the child to this world but you will never know the end of that child. Even if you're the one who teaches him, molds him and make his personality but that child will still learn some things on his own. That child will still form his own personality and thoughts. Similarly, I might right this story but eventually the story will move on its own and I would merely write it down. The rules that would be created of this world I shall create will be of its own which myself as a write, I cannot change.
I hope you stay with us till the end of this journey.

Title: Magical Girl Selector
Synopsis: After waking up in a strange room with no memory, Lexar is offered a contract that grants him the power to explore the world of infinity. In exchange, he has to find those with potential to save one world from its impending apocalypse.

Title: Titan Sol
Synopsis:
Cast aside by his family and friends as trash Seshwan, a young noble who’s only ever known the life of a high-class citizen arrives in the remote trading port city of Scarlet’s cove. Having been sent to live with his uncle, the cruel city lord, Seshwan is distanced from the people of the city. This separation furthers the hatred of those around him.
 
His old life has slipped out of reach. Without the power to reclaim what he had he seeks out work with mercenary guilds in the city. After being turned away from several guilds, he resigns to his inevitable fate. Though as he’s contemplating his options he stumbles upon an injured boy in an alley; An encounter that will forever change his fate.
 

Spoiler: Spoiler


 look for the up to date story on Wattpad, or Wuxiaworld.com under original creations

Title: Devil's prototype
Synopsis:
In an world of magic and twelve gods. 
One god rebelled against the others. He that rebelled got banished into the underworld and rose to become king. 
His intentions were unknown, but people were taught he was evil.
one day an man in despair, sold his soul to the fallen god. And so the journey begins.
-note-
I wrote this in word and the spaces didn't copy, so if some line seems messed up. You know I messed it up, while manually trying to add spaces.

Title: The Birth of God
Synopsis: Aiden has lived his entire life with the aim of becoming the hero to kill the evil overlord, who has brought chaos and destruction to the world. However, when he finally manages to get into a position where he can strike him down, the evil overlord reveals something to Aiden: That he was created by the him. His creation was for two purposes. One, to satisfy the evil man's boredom, and the second, to satiate the his curiosity. Aiden's soul is the first to be created not by god, but rather by man. The evil overlord questioned what would happen after Aiden died. Would his soul simply dissipate into nothingness? Or would it act differently than a normal soul that was created by a god?

Title: The Unexpected Heroes
Synopsis:
An experiment created to destroy.
 
A hero turned traitor. 
 
A heiress to an emperor.
 
A man without an identity.
 
The world is slowly falling to darkness, falling down under the weight of villains that seek its destruction. The world desperately needs heroes t protect it and they have risen from all walks of life to answer the call. To the public and the world outside these beings are existences others would call monsters, shamed for their pasts and histories. But in this time of need they are the power needed to turn the tide of darkness that beckons at the door. 
 
They are the unexpected heroes. 
 
 
Ps: This is a re-write of one of my previous stories. So you may have seen it before (But more likely not).

Title: Catalogue Reality
Synopsis:
What is the difference between a dream and reality? Reality is the place that you come back to. But what about those who can't come back, those who are stuck on the border between two worlds, unable to say which is the dream. They say that the human mind is of two halves, but wouldn't this also apply to the human world as well? 
There are two realities, both so different stemming from the same source, humanity. One world where science and intelligence dominates all, and the other where magic and the might of will is paramount. These two worlds were once one, in the days when humans were of one mind. But the gap between the two has been closing, something is coming, a calamity the scale and breadth of which would shake two worlds to there very core and bring them together as one. As governments and kingdoms are thrown into chaos the world order is turned on its head and the battle for survival begins. 
But the question remains; Who is mankind's true enemy?

Title: Neverland
Synopsis: I was now a level 1 Baby Dragon.

Title: Apocalyptic World, Cheat
Synopsis:
The peaceful scenery was ruined by a Meteor, 
People struggling to survive..
Food is important in this Apocalyptic world. 
 
One student with the power of Gamer, 
Trying to Level up,
And Babysit at the same time. 
 
(If this Summarize is bad, please help me make it better.. :'D)

Title: Synaesthesia
Synopsis:
Five years of rigorous training. Of enduring the blistering cold and torment. Pushing his body to its limits. 
The Trials had finally arrived. 
Deep in the mountains, a sequestered sect of warriors, known as the Jeurlin monks, lie hidden on the snow-capped Mount Kumu. Mahi, a Jeurlin student, after being torn from his family, faces the Trials that will earn him his Krane: the mark of a fully fledged Jeurlin monk. The Trials are perilous, pushing the body, the mind and the soul to their worldly limits. 
But for Mahi, the last Synaesthesian, the Trials are different. 
Different...
 
and deadly.

Title: Immortal Dual Sword God
Synopsis:
In this plane of existence, there lay a set of gods...
These gods were the absolute pinnacle of existence, looking down upon mortals with disdain...
The King of Gods, the most powerful man in existence, looked upon all the realms as a heavenly king...
Then time itself froze and this very king, along with several countless gods felt their very innermost soul tremble...
At the same time, a boy named Aryia was born...

Title: King's Shadow: A Tale of Magic and Adventure
Synopsis:
Gather round, mortals, and listen close. 
Here lies a tale of magic and adventure, of betrayal and intrigue, of glory and honor.
A mercenary of darkness, once revered as a warrior of the realm, makes his way across treacherous lands. He seeks to avenge the wrongs done to his people, to reclaim the birthright owed to him, but make no mistake, dear reader—he is no hero. 
Clever and ambitious, Gael Nighthawk jouneys through danger armed only with his weapon and his wit. On his path to vengeance he will meet bloodthirsty kings, beautiful nymphs and powerful priestesses. He will brave trials no man has faced before, all for the name of glory and greatness. Will he be triumphant in his quest, or will he succumb to the viciousness that is the world of Pandemonia?
Read on, mortal, and find out...

Title: Last Grace: The Apex of Another World
Synopsis:
The light of Heaven fell a millennium ago, the fallen betrayer then is crowned Hells king. The Devil grew bored and rebellious, now a monster is let free. Compelled not to prior bonds of purity but to villainy, the primordial enigma is destined for greatness on the road to the pinnacle. His long forgotten connections that were never granted now on an ever distant peak. One that he had to now climb in a mortals lifetime in a world too far apart from Earth's grim reality. 

The MC is Evil, with that there are many topics that are considered dark in it.
(Slavery, Sexual Content, Mind Control and Death.) 
The cover was made with resources that are free to use that I found online.

Title: Helmer's Theory: A Butterfly Effects
Synopsis: A spin on choas theory and the multiple worlds theory; following a college student (Kenny Haris) and professor (Zachariah delnoir) who form a bond from their love of science. Together they finished building upon a time machine that Zach and his last partner start many years ago. Will it work? And if it does what's their next move.

Title: I reincarnated into a bat (Indefinite hiatus)
Synopsis: His only wish is to find a way to turn back into a human and live a life without regrets.Book cover artist: Jeko98

Title: Remnant of the green beast
Synopsis: It is a one-shot about Rock Lee from Konoha reborn as a faunus on Remnant, the world of RWBY

Title: Fragility
Synopsis:
Ulysses Daltroy can be considered a practical person, he has to be. After all, when you suddenly become one of the most hated people in the world you have to adapt accordingly. So when the World is forced to participate in a set of trials for an unknown purpose, Ulysses finds himself going through the same routine with a new set of obstacles. Will he do his best to help humanity or speed up its extinction?

A/N: I probably won't be updating until I finish writing The Void Wolf.
Credit for that fantastic piece of nightmare fuel: Zdzislaw Beksinski

Title: Eight God Engine
Synopsis: Jaq understands running.   At sixteen, she escaped the mystic cult that raised her, stealing a million dollars on her way out. She's been on the move ever since.   Jaq understands hiding.   Staying quiet is the only strategy that works against monks who enslave dead gods to keep a lid on the supernatural world.   Until the monks find her, a mass murderer begins stalking her, and she's forced to stand in the path of a Divine Force of Destruction.    All within the course of a week.   ...might be time for a new strategy.   An Urban Fantasy Set In A Unique Universe Eight God Engine

Title: SETSUNA to KAZAMI
Synopsis:
Have you ever thought of it??
What if you lose.... everything that was yours...things that defined you...things you would have liked to spend more time with??
Here's a story,sometimes dark sometimes fluffy,go and try it....if you can connect with ,any of, the character..I think you'll like it.??!!..

Title: Origin Story
Synopsis:
There was no Dao, so we built it. There were things outside the Dao, so we exceeded it. There was nothing left to attain, so we forgot it. Now, in a world built upon the shadows of Their glory, ten trillion immortals seek the Beyond of the Heavens
And benighted, they will not find it.
Down, deep in the depths of a fathomless Dark, an old master sees the world return once again. And as it barrels down a long and selfsame road to oblivion, the master sends a shadow of it's imprisoned might into existence, knowing that it will not save a single thing.Alas! The day that the shadow is born is the day that it is doomed to die.This is the tale of what happens after.

Title: Stray Sheep
Synopsis:
My take on the "another world" genre. This is also my first fiction, so expect mistakes...
Updates every sunday (at least. I might update more than one time a week if I feel like it).
Every update will have around 2.000 words (at least for now).

Title: When Kings Die
Synopsis: Jebe has left his poor home on the frontier to join the Leo Military in hopes of earning enough money to pay off the family debt. To his, and everybody’s surprise, Jebe has quite a bit more talent for war than expected. In this tale Jebe joins the military with originally simple goals and soon finds himself at the center of a conflict that will turn the whole continent upside.

Title: Blossom
Synopsis: Editing....To be posted ^^

Title: Master Builder
Synopsis:
A being, a boy, is born in a world, for what pupose, who knows? Maybe to find himself. Maybe its just for living. Maybe to end all evil? Let's find out.
Thank you for reading. Comments and critiques are welcome.
 
This story is going to be update here on RRL exclusively, any stealing of material or ideas will result in the content being taken down.

Title: Fantasy's Nightmare
Synopsis:
One boy follows his obsession in to a barely developed world with death and destruction accompanying him. The only thing helping him a system that allows him to purchase the abilities from all of fiction, his wit, and his will. But will that be enough, his enemies are the races of that planet, other chosen with the same system, and the enviroment.
Will this introverted boy grow strong, survive and floursh finally obtaining his obsession or will he join the other skulls laying under other's feet?
Update trying for once a week.

Title: Just Another Ghoul
Synopsis:
For more years than anyone can count, Vampires and Humans have been at war, the powerful weapons of old have been lost to humanity, and they once again fight with sword and shield. Every time they clash, humanity puts up a valiant effort, but kingdom after kingdom fall to the Vampiric hordes.
In the latest battle for their survival, a group of human 'heroes' are taken prisoner by the great vampire lord Cezar von Imrik to present to his unholy liege Hellreid. Amongst the vampires great army, the heroes happen to meet an unusual Ghoul. Not only can he talk fluently, he also seems to insubordinate towards his master!
Could this be an indication of the vampires power weakening? Could it be a prophesy of things to come? Could this be, the last hope for mankind?!
No, no it isn't. It's just another Ghoul.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WARNING:
This is my second LitRPG fiction, and is another one of my 'experimental fictions' where I just write and see where it goes. The previous two being my Star Wars fanfiction 'Sith of the Old Empire' and my original cyberpunk fiction 'New Boston: City of Hope'. Neither of which got past chapter 2. This story should be alot more easy going and easier to write, so I'm hoping it'll get further, but this is just a warning to let you know what you're in for. 
 
Warning Tagged [15+] for Strong Language, Gore, Violence .

Title: Stranger in Another World
Synopsis:
Imra was an ordinary adult female that died by a mistake of Goddess, but she was given a boon to reincarnated into a whole new world.
With the power of a Gamer like and a broken power,
she will journey as a female ugly elf, that are often -always- mistaken as an ugly male.
Slaves, Monster, and Adventure..is waiting for her, Read as she struggling and failing to become beautiful
But once life gets better, She now has a Sister, Beautiful features and Maybe a fiancee.
Her real family shown up in her life just to messed things up.

Title: Evolved
Synopsis: in 2021 a secret government facility underneath a chemical plant is housing gene 175 aka the evolution gene. when the chemical plant blows up, it unleashes gene 175 upon the world. after laying dormant for a year, gene 175 activates; thus begins the apocalypse. people either evolve to gain power, or they deviate becoming abhorred. ten years into the apocalypse Noah Brookhart, who lost his family, now loses his life. in the ten years he experienced the apocolypse, he never once "awakened" his powers. after dying he wakes up nearly 10 years in the past (about a month after the apocolypse started,) after which, he evolves to stage 2 (which he never managed to do before,) discovering his power. now that he has a new found streangth can he avoid his bleak future?

Title: Full Cycle
Synopsis:
“It should have been better for me to have never met you.”  - Her
“Our path was destined to never meet from the start however I never regretted meeting you” - him
“Should I blame the gods for allowing me to meet you?” – Her
“I bow to the gods in thanks for allowing me to meet you.” – Him

Title: The Elemental Swords - Book One: Sunder
Synopsis: Present war fast approaching its climax. This is a series of books featuring a boy named Zilian. Living in a time of war, anything could happen and that it does. Everything ends up falling apart around him, life as he knew it was not the truth, living a life obscure of what was the truth of his father and in turn of not knowing the truth, he loses his father. Friendships are forged, closer ones are lost. Allies are made, enemies retaliate. The responsibility of the sword rests upon him.

Title: Of Cringe and More Cringe
Synopsis:
Warning: This is a GENDER BENDER story and I'm writing it just because so I practically don't give much care about people's opinions and that also means the quality of the story is pretty much not guaranteed. Rather, expect lazy writing, bad titles and names. Chapters can be short or long; my call. I may also drop this whenever I feel like it. You have been warned.
 
It went without saying that Japan was famous for its entertainment value; especially when it came to anime. A certain high school girl was addicted to anime and would constantly check for new releases every season. Unfortunately, she had one big pet peeve for anime. A rom-com such as Rakudai Kishi no Cavalry and Saijaku Muhai no Bahamut to name a few, that started with accidentally coming in to see a naked girl, who was the main heroine and from that encounter, she would fall in love with the MC. Alas, the anime world was filled with such animes.
 
The girl who found such anime to be extremely cringey and hard to swallow was transfered into a world similar to one of her biggest pet peeves of all time; a rom-com.

Title: The Priest
Synopsis:
Cleric, Paladin, even Druids are considered better classes all around then the priest class. After all a little healing plus damage, too bad Izeal has no idea about games at all. Always worried about makin ends meat for his family, who unfortauntly for him are considered game fanatics including his mother, father, older twin siblins who are brother and sister, along with his younger brother. Who all make money through live streaming though its not considered enough to live off such a big family. So in return Izeal works hard not bothering with games until though some miracle his parents inherited a large some of money from a in game sale. After lossing a job, they talk him into finally playin a game, his entire family got excited and all decided to buy a new game coming out called Edina has he agreed to party with them. Though within the first hour of the game he got lost, though his only question what the fuck is an hp bar? Too bad his familly never explained how games work to him.
 
first attempt at one of this things plz be gentle

Title: L.I.F.E. Begins (Book 1 - Complete)
Synopsis:
Humanity tried to fix the planet, but in their ignorance, forced humanity as a whole to retreat underground instead. In the future, and stuck with a life as boring as it could possibly be; Jack retreats to the virtual world his great-great grandfather had designed. L.I.F.E., or the Latent Integrated Fantasy Experience, was the best thing to hit the market... 200 years ago. Jack was determined to find that one game that would be the diamond in the rough; the one that every gamer searched for. A game you could actually live for. What he found was a game he would die for.
Please Note: Chapters will be added weekly (Saturdays).

Title: Familia: Ang simula
Synopsis:
Why do people play computer games? Is it something that you do for fun? Is it somebody does to get out of reality? A job? Something you do to be closer to somebody?
 
A new VR game just came out. Komunidad a sandbox type of MMORPG that would hook the entire world in it. From Defeating monsters, Crafting Weapon, Starting a party, Player vs Player combat, Fishing or even making your own attire for the party in the palace. you name it you could do it. are you ready? Good Luck Have Fun
are you ready to play the game? Good Luck Have Fun!

Title: Titan's Avatar
Synopsis:
In a tale as old as time. A mighty being was at death's doorsteps. The great battle had exhausted him. He called his greatest warrior to him. He would give the warrior his power, so the world would be protected when he left it. But he warned the warrior. The mighty being would never let his power be used for evil. If it was he promised the warrior a calamity would fall upon his people.
 
Time passed and the warrior left a great legacy. The Star Empire, so powerful it would encompass two continents. But the descendant of the warrior fell to greed. He sought to increase his power and fought against those similar to him. He lost, the Star Empire fell and its people became nothing more than prisoners and slaves. this is the story of a boy. A boy who wants nothing more than freedom.
 
But will he pay the heavy price that freedom entails? Will he walk the long path of hardship to a better tomorrow? One can only see.

This is my first time writing a novel of any sorts to be honest. I will try to put up a chapter every Saturday unless real life prevents me. Any constructive criticism would be appreciated. As well as any mistakes, im only a high school student so they may come up every now and then.

Title: The Endless Path
Synopsis:
Hacke was a normal college student with a past that in his opnion was better left alone.
When the System came he was one of the few to risk it all on the Trimel's dice and that brought him some very dangerous attention.
Want to know what happened to him? Read so you can find out.
 
 
 
Hello people! as English is not my main language I can't prevent some mistakes so please cope with it.

Title: Stratus Online: Awakening
Synopsis:
Edwin Morris has been playing Sakarn Online almost his whole life, in fact, most people have. While he considers himself a skilled player, he never could really find the time to take his game to the next level and pay the bills. After he is finally pushed over the edge with his job at Burger Planet, Edwin stumbles upon a man representing a game company called Stratus Labs. 
Edwin is offered a lucrative position within the company to test and beat Stratus Online, an incredible, fully-immersive MMO designed to dethrone Sakarn Online. Edwin will have to unite with his friends and compete against other teams, but not everything is as it seems within Stratus Labs and the stakes are much higher than he could have ever imagined.
With the clock ticking, will Edwin have what it takes to complete the seemingly insurmountable task of beating Stratus Online before it's too late?

Title: Vitriolism
Synopsis: Derrick gets thrown out onto the streets with no more than his backpack and a stack of fifties. He is told to create a life out of what he has, and to carve out his own path rather than follow others. After a couple of strange occurences, Derrick finds himself in a strange place with strange people living a strange life.

Title: For Lillies and Roses
Synopsis:
-Spoilers-
Today, there was a new event released in the game Angelia Online. 
The announcement stated that those who conquered a mythical dungeon, no matter the amount of people, would receive enourmous rewards.
Thus, the two sides that should always have been opposed to one another, the Demon King and Hero, have come together to clear out this event. 
When the Demon King and his 4 retainers along with the Hero and his party finally clear out the dungeon, they suddently get transported to a room where multiple gods greet them and make them their champions.
How will a stereotypical justice-seeking Hero, a tsundere Demon King and other crazy characters deal with this new world? Read and find out I guess...?

Title: The Alpha Virus
Synopsis:
When the world's most eccentric software developer takes it upon himself to end all war by wiping out most of humanity, he includes a special little surprise in his latest groundbreaking games console. His new augmented reality game, The Alpha Virus, seems to outstay its welcome long after the player signs out.
Fatally flippant college student Liza Volkov has had an ... unconventional upbringing, and has finally escaped her survivalist family to seek her fortune in the wide world. But when you try to escape your past, life has a way of dragging you back down. 
When every day is a fight for survival, the smart and the strong come out on top. No nepotism. No class systems. No boring corporate jobs. It's a constant fight, and Liza was born to brawl. Is it so bad that she isn't completely broken up about this new world? 
Do you have a plan for the zombie apocalypse yet?

Title: The Nameless
Synopsis:
Three different people have risen above The Nameless. They've done the impossible, so they are rewarded with power ordinary people can only dream of. Followers in droves, riches as far as the eye can see, but more than that,
They were granted a name of power. 
Eternal life, mastery over an element, mastery over a very action. They have everything and more, and a grand story is forming. It is coming quickly, to shake the very foundations that have been forming over centuries of peace. To crush empires, and drown a kingdom, no, the entire world in the blood.

Title: A Otaku's life living in a Xianxia world
Synopsis:
Our mc Mike Fox thinks he has been born in a different world. Seeing a chance to reincarnate, He grabs this chance.
 
Watch how our mc lives his life in a xianxia world with the sharingan.

Title: Red Souls
Synopsis:
In a world where Superheroes and villains exist, the conflicts that can not be solved by mere words will inevitably rise.Jack Mercer, a 17 year old high school student, becomes a victim in an unavoidable tragedy - but it also becomes the catalyst for an incredible change in him which will either lead him down the path to unparalleled greatness, or towards the cycle of the madness and darkness.
 
Please note: The early draft/WIP chapters can be found in the Novel Updates Forums. 
Also, the chapters can be found on the Fantasy-Books.live as well.

Title: You're Mecha-ing Me Crazy!
Synopsis:
VRMMORPG has become the hottest craze and has taken the world by storm. With a world devoted to Mechs and Machines that has yet to be explored, our hero embarks on a journey to become the best player in the game. 
Welcome to [Otomech Full Drive]

Author's Note:
Hope you have as much fun reading it as I have writing it. Expect a new chapter every 2 days.

Title: Mandate of Heaven
Synopsis:
The mandate of heaven is lost. A dynasty crumbles and time erodes away at the truth. Kingdoms, factions and other empires rise and fall, all claiming to be descended from the divine lineage.
Since the mandate was lost, a class of strength arose amongst the warriors of the continent. Heavenrippers.
To tear away the very fate of the heavens and manifest it within the self.
Perhaps this is how, the mandate can be reclaimed.

Title: The Adventures of Einarr Stigandersen
Synopsis:
Einarr Stigandersen is the dispossessed prince of Raenshold, his father its landless Thane. They sail from port to port, leading a vagabond's life aboard the longship Vidofnir, until a fateful battle with a demon ship and an unnatural storm send them reeling to Kjell Hall. A princess' beauty and the Jarl's wrath soon conspire to send Einarr on a series of impossible quests.
Will Einarr and the Vidofnings find adventure, glory, and revenge, or will they end as ashes in the frozen seas?

Chapters released Tuesdays and Thursdays. Newest chapters can be found on my personal blog (2 chapters ahead).

 Covers for individual volumes done by Wil Eyster at Eyster Artistry.

Title: Tale of the Devil
Synopsis:
The child born with white hair and red eyes was called a Devil by the people around him.Is he really a Devil or something else?
(I just started writing this to improve my english writing skills so there will be many mistakes.Please bear with it and point out mistakes to me so that I can fix them.)

Title: Legends of The Wesh: Lochley
Synopsis:
The Universe is held together by something. It is an undisputable truth but nobody knows what that something is. 
People claim that it is connected by The Path of Legends, where Gods traversed trying to find the meaning of their own existence. Others claim that the universe is a Tree, connecting worlds with its extending branches and giving life-bearing fruits to its inhabitants. Several even claimed that the Universe is just a colony of ants, that this universe and the worlds in it are just as insignificant as insects. 
In one of the Worlds in it, the arrival of someone signaled great changes. Gods will die, Trees will Rot, Insects will burn. Those at the top had fallen and they will upend the worlds trying to claim what was theirs. Those at the bottom have had enough of scraps and they yearned to devour the fruits of the worlds. Those that were innocent and caught in between had no choice but to persist, lest they get erased by the surging tides.
Nobody knows where will they end, but everybody knew where they started. They will not be judged, they will not be rebuked, they will not be curbed, they will not be vanquished.
The universe is their canvas and it’s time — time to paint their truths upon it.

Azrael was born as a prince in the warring world of Ost. Inheriting the title but not its privileges and oppressed by his siblings in every step of his life, he had no choice but to be subservient to their whims until circumstances spiraled him to the abyss, to a new world, and to more agreeable companions.
But is he truly free from the past or will it continue to hound him to his new life?

Elira had one wish… to be known more than as an offspring of the Great Phasol Family. Talented, hardworking, and stubborn, she struggled to break free from the influence of her family.
Everything had been going well in her life but is she strong enough to resist the upheaval and truths of the world?

William grew up in an orphanage with nothing to his name. Regaled by various tales of fantasy and greatness by his caretakers, he reached adulthood with the goal of having a legend of his own.
Will he make his mark on the world or be forgotten like an ant; crushed by the boot of an unsuspecting traveler.

The world of Lochley has been at peace for centuries and its undercurrents are growing restless from waiting… waiting for that spark of opportunity to ignite and swallow the world whole.
Some will cause it, some will resist it, and some be drowned by it.
Which one will you be?

Title: We Don't Want to be Main Characters!
Synopsis:
Twins Kazama and Belle were born under a lucky(?) star. They are the main characters of not only this story, but many others in their own world. Psychic powers, magic, alternate worlds, and every other trope from anime and literature rears its head in their daily lives. After becoming jaded by their crazy experiences, the twins have decided to aggressively pursue normal high school lives.
 

Currently on hiatus for the forseeable future. The current schedule is one chapter every week. There will be a one week break after a set (series of named chapters) ends.

Title: Hiro: The Big brother (Big Hero 6 AU)
Synopsis:
An alternate universe in which Hiro is the big brother and Tadashi is the little brother. 
Synopsis:
Hiro had a hard enough life without a younger brother. He was a genius, but everyone had expectations for him. He was shunned for his intelligence. What would change if Hiro and Tadashi's ages were swapped. What would change? Hiro and Tadashi-centric.

Title: Elements of War- Fireborn: The Flames of War
Synopsis:
Once upon a time... Yes I know, it's cliche but isn't that how all stories begin. Where was I?
Once upon a time in a far off world four nations ruled in peace. The governed the northern continent of Aeos, and lived at one with nature. It was a golden age of magic, might, and wonder. This was the Era of Magic, a time when even the poorest of children could be born with the spark for greatness.
Then it all ended. Magic, the driving force behind their civilization, ceased to exist and the world plunged into an age of darkness. The Era of Magic ended. Although the Four Lands had had their foundations ripped from under them the stood up once again and rebuilt themselves. No longer at harmony with nature or even their fellow man wars were sparked and spread. Until brother fought brother, father fought son. This was the Era of Loss, soaked in the blood of it's people.
Now the force of magic, gone for so long returns to the land on a quiet whisper. Just as the worst war yet is sparked amongst the people of the Four Lands.
-------------------------
Author's Note: This is the first book in an eight book series. For those who have problems with finding a book they enjoy and then the author stops writing that won't be a problem. This first book is complete and I am posting it to obtain feedback to refine my writing style, as well as see if it's popular enough to continue writing the series.

Title: Boredom of a Goddess
Synopsis:
What? Humans have gone and wiped themselves out? What a bother.
The sequel to Devour. You CAN read this as a standalone novel without reading Devour first.
Beta Reader: Legit.

Title: Zombageddon
Synopsis: This is the way the world ends! Not with a band but a whimper. Aliens have been watching our world ever since an unexplained meteor shower saturated the planet with nanites. They have deemed our species as predatory and have decided to test our race if we are ready to join the Galactic Council and hundreds of other worlds. Their first test is to see if we can survive the Zombie Armageddon. 1% of the population will be turned into Zombies each day for the next time days and the rest of us must survive the new crazy system they have imposed on us. Over the next ten years, the story looks on the life of Dan Adams a Texan hoping to keep his family alive through all of the aliens tests. (Author Note: This is my second story on RoyalRoadl. My heart and soul is in World of Argos and this is just for fun as I get writers block on my other story. I would expect long dead periods between chapters, but yes I will always return to this story and update it.)

Title: Savage Empress's Cultivation
Synopsis: After an introverted Legend-ranked female assassin with red eyes and outstanding cultivation talents in modern day earth gets drugged by somebody she trusted, she takes him down with her and ultimately blows the both of them up. After her soul enters the body of the daughter of a cultivator and a Sovereign-ranked demon, she decided to seal her memories in the body of this child who shares both her name and eyes. She had no will to live, and after sealing her memories in the child, allows herself to be swept away by the dao. With the sealed memories of a great assassin and the mixed blood inside of her, what will happen to this young girl born into a declining clan in a cruel world of schemes and bloodshed?

Title: The Kingmaker Race
Synopsis:
Aight lads, you see all those grand scale fantasy novels? Yeah well this ain't that. This story follows Anders, a self-styled information trader in the slums of the greatest nation on the continent. The Great King has died, shit hit the fan and generally the city of Farfeld is in a precarious place.
The shockwaves of this death even has the thugs in the slums stirring in ambition.
Anders has to deal with it.
Enjoy.
 
Updates will be haphazard. The content is written, I know where I'm going but drafting and fixing things up and delineating chapters is its own thing and I'm apprehensive about uploading her in the first place. If this gets a good reception, I may upload in bulk.

Title: Morgan the Monster Slayer
Synopsis:
Chaos is consuming the world, but one girl is quickly changing into the one who consumes.
This fiction is set at the same time and in the same city of my other fiction, Reborn as a dungeon core in an apocalyptic world. Read my other fiction for a darker story from the POV of a misanthrope Dungeon Core. To avoid spoilers, read up to chapter nine in the other fiction before starting this one.

Title: Undoing The Past
Synopsis: A young man loses his life and enter a new world where he tries to protect everyone from his past life, yet he is meeting new people in this new and seemingly unreal life. Funny enough the fate of many important things rest on his decisions and what will happen to these people of his past life. So he must answer one of the most important questions in life, will he abandon his past that molded him into the person he is now or will he sacrifice this new life to save the people he loved so much in the past? Come along on this heart-pounding, suprising, unforgiving adventure as we see what our protagonist, Kei, will choose when it matters most.

Title: SEEING BEYOND
Synopsis:
Xianxia, fast-paced, overpowered and scheming >>> Welcome.
A man lived working his whole life from school to his death. He was a succesful businessman but one day saw his company failing and he lost everything: Money, family, friends, status... He realized the cruelty of life and how everyone around him had only faked emotions.
Cursing himself for having believed in others and not seeing through their made-up faces, having nothing left and no one to turn to and being too old to start things again from the beginning, he jumps and dies...But he won't have the luxury to rest as a new life awaits him.
This time, he won't make the same mistakes, he will try to see beyond the truth of things.
 
Delivered to you by UGU

Title: Antagonist's Sidekick Becomes the Hero!
Synopsis:
"Do you find yourself bored, with nothing to do? Have you ever wondered why you don't live an eventful life, like the main characters in stories? Then look no further than Rise to Prominence, the latest game coming to the JoyBox this summer! Fight monsters, beat bad guys, and win the girls' hearts! Work your way up the social ladder within the Academy and become the most popular student! Gain a fan club and sweep the girls off their feet! Heck, get some of the guys as well! With Rise to Prominence, your life will be nothing, if not eventful!
 
Buy it now, for $39.99! While supplies last."
___________________________________
A strange selection, an enigmatic setting, and an ever growng amount of stuff to do. These are what he must deal with, after being reborn as an unfortunate person destined to be single and alone, in a world of magic and mystery.
 
Will he throw off his mantle of loner? Most likely.
Will he become the best? Sure.
Will he get a girlfriend? Duh, he's the MC.
 
But what if there are others in a similar situation as him?

Title: I'm Gonna Be a Wizard When I Grow up Again!
Synopsis: A man on his death bed regrets only one thing in his life: not being able to become a wizard. Fortunately he is reincarnated into a world where magic does exist. Will he be able to accomplish his dream? Or maybe fate (the author) has other plans for him…

Title: The world traveler
Synopsis:
A child with mysterious origin travel between the various worlds as he grow and gain experience, at the same time making various friends, rivals, enemies and stealing the hearts of many beauties, as he slowly tries to unravel his origins .
 
                                                    **Author's note**
This is a story that I'm writing at my free time, don't expect frequent chapters. At most once or twice a week .Prologue about 10 chapter before going to his first world .I'm still not sure which one should be his first world .Probably naruto , other worlds I'm still deciding .Feel free to post critism or reviews, along the way . And BTW english is my second language so I'll probably f*ck the grammar quite often so feel free to correct me .And thanks, hope I would continue writing .

Title: Ragnarok
Synopsis:
This is an attempt at a wuxia fantasy hybrid that aims to fix the problems with the wuxia genre, mainly side characters, character development, bland romance, repetative combat, an evil mc for no reason, stupidity and cultivation. 
Cultivation angers me to no end, supposedly gaining power by sitting in a room with eyes closed. People would be bored out of their minds so quickly. It's all based luck at birth and talent at sitting still...
There will be cultivation, but the main characters (and they will be characters, not flat emotionless filler) will not cultivate. The main character will be dark but with purpose, the heroine will not fall instantly or easily for the main character, it will not even be helpless romance, it will be violent, brutal, and passionate. Each character will have wants and motives that they will strive for, not simply following the main character into danger because plot armor.

Title: Soul Harmony
Synopsis: A genius gamer, a skilled assassin, a popular scammer, and a renowned doctor died at the same time got reincarnated into an another world on the same body. A female body

Title: Red Thread
Synopsis:
Dropped.
Brian went home and fell asleep, only to find himself in a strange place, where everything was possible and everybody used all kind of means to achieve their goals.
Especially with some guys targetting him, Brian had nearly lost hope on surviving, if Ayax, the orange bird, didn''t help him.
But only accompanied by a bird, can he survive in this strange foreign place?

Title: Nothing goes the way I expect!!!
Synopsis:
Yeah Im too lazy to write a summary so just stick around and you'll find out!!
 
 
 
 
Oh and the art isnt mine so i dont take any ownership over it neither do i own any of the pics in my novels

Title: The Adventure of a Spirt
Synopsis:
Finding herself in a brand new world not knowing who she is, a lesser spirt embarks on her journey to explore this new world.
 
 
 
This is my first story so it might not be so good. If you find anything wrong with the gramma please feel free to comment!!!

Title: I am infamous
Synopsis: Kessler a boy who was taken to another unknown land while playing an intense game, woke up as a newborn child who struggles to adapt to his new life as young heir to a strong and ancient family follow his adventures as he slowly reveals his terrifying talent and discovers the hidden wonders the world has to offer.

Title: To Follow Saudade
Synopsis:
"Saudade (European Portuguese: [s?w?ðað?], Brazilian Portuguese: [saw?dadi] or [saw?dad?i], Galician: [saw?ðaðe]; plural saudades) is a deep emotional state of nostalgic or profound melancholic longing for an absent something or someone that one loves. Moreover, it often carries a repressed knowledge that the object of longing might never return. One English translation of the word is missingness. Stronger forms of saudade might be felt towards people and things whose whereabouts are unknown, such as a lost lover, or a family member who has gone missing, moved away, separated, or died.
Saudade was once described as "the love that remains" after someone is gone." The world is a remnant of its former glory. In times long past, it had risen to a golden age of hero and myth, as humanity valiantly waged a war against demonkind until they were beaten back to the very edges of existence. This was not without cost, however, and soon both sides were echoes of their former selves.One such echo takes the form of a girl, as she feverishly chases the trail of her disappeared heroic ancestor to little result. This trail leads her to a windy, lonely mountain on the outskirts of the realm of humanity, where she is met by a strange young man who is, no matter how frayed by time the thread is, tied to her family. As he is her last hope of achieving her dream, she has only one option, whether they like it or not—Drag him along for the ride, no matter where it might take them.

Title: My Cursed Beloved
