Title: Struggles of a Slave
Synopsis: This is the story of Tio and Slater. One is a beast-kin slave and the other a slave master. These two idiots will try their hardest to live!

Title: Kingdom
Synopsis: Harold Grimes wrote fantasy stories to escape the debt and drudgery of his all-too-mundane life. But after waking up in the body of his main character, Harold must use every ounce of courage and wit he has to survive in a bloody world rife with betrayal and slaughter. The catch? He's now a prince.

Title: The King of Phantoms
Synopsis:
5 years ago when humans who can transform into some kind of creatures known as specters appeared and the struggle for the title king of phantoms occurred. Only the phantom king can utilize the power of the red moon and make the impossible possible. Though hundreds of skirmishes occurred, the eight king candidates are still in the fight but what would happen when a ninth candidate who should not exist appeared?
The story would also contain images/llustrations.

Title: Nerds in Dungeonia!
Synopsis:
“Welcome to Dungeonia!”
Jack stared at the words, the true depth of their meaning impossible to know. Before him, in a book never opened, was a list of his attributes: Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma. The instructions were simple:
“You will have to choose a Race, Class, and Background before you can enter.”
It was Dungeons & Dragons, and the character was him. What’s more, two of his friends were along for the ride. Unable to go home, they created a party of adventurers to see what’s in store for them in this world called Dungeonia.
Will Jack and his friends make it back home? Can their friendship survive under the strains of living in a dangerous realm of fantasy? Will their knowledge of D&D save them from the threats and machinations of goblins, fey, cultists, and an ancient wizard? Are they the only people from the real world trapped in Dungeonia? If everything truly functions like D&D, then who is the Dungeon Master?
Some may be answered, some may forever remain mysteries in…
Nerds in Dungeonia!

Title: Celestial Magus
Synopsis:
-- on indefinite hiatus --
Follow the epic journey of an otherworldly scientist who have transmigrated into the body of a young man in a world where magic is the norm.

Title: Repentance
Synopsis:
It all started when the earth was forsaken. 
Scientist and priests around the world put aside their differences and created Scientific Religion, in hopes to prevent nuclear war between nations from destroying the earth, only to ignite religious extremist to launch nuclear missiles around the planet to appease the Gods.
As the missiles fell from the sky, meteors plummeted towards the earth causing massive devastation around the world. In the final moments, a sinister voice echoes in everyone's head...
"The era of humanity has come to an end."
-----------------------------------------
Taking a break to edit chapters and working on another story.

Title: The Restoration
Synopsis:
When a twenty year old rugby player was involved in a horrific tragedy one would assume that it was the end.
But, what if it wasn't.
What if that very individual awoke in a world that didn't follow what he thought the rules of a world were.
What if that world was composed of many different nations and the people could harness different types of power.
This is the tale of what happens if all the above was true.

Title: Strongest Amongts The Strong
Synopsis:
Zhang Yun, male. A societies trash, his parents died after a battle, his childhood friend left him, everyone ridicule and mock him, but little did they know Zhang Yun who was been a trash since his parents died has now risen from the trash to a dragon that would soar through the endless sky now join him, join Zhang Yun on his adventure in Revenge. Thun Thun Thunnnnnn.
Not My Own Pick

Title: the Mediator
Synopsis:
Award-winning rock musician Kris Maya had just held a ground-breaking concert, with an arena packed with his most die-hard fans. His songs that contemplated the human condition: desires, love, pain, loss, fantasy and reality, and his philosophy towards life have garnered a great number of people to follow his every move and as he strummed the last chord that signaled the end of his song, he stumbled in pain and collapsed.
With a smile, he closed his eyes on the curtains of his final concert in this life. As the applause of his show turned to become murmurs of worry and disbelief, he was happy and excited. Still, he felt that he was ready and he was anticipating his return to the world where all his past mistakes left a grueling and bloody mark on its history.
This world that he filled with his music had taught him many lessons.
In Earth, the power of music served as his gateway to learning.
When he returns to his former world, his overwhelming power of magic will teach others the same lessons; the bloodshed being the only difference.
It was now time to pay it forward.

Title: Change
Synopsis:
A below-average guy is looked down by everyone. His parent's died in a car crash. His grades are horrible. His IQ is even worse. His appearance... well let's just not talk about that. So what if he could change? What if he could see his own stats? And have a level up system? Well that didn't happen and he was just a macronald's manager who died at age 25 from an unknown cancer.
Unknowningly, he travelled back in time 9 years before. Where he has his GCSE's coming up in 5 months. But also a level-up system, finally... Ta-dah!

Title: World Savior
Synopsis:
A young man was sucked in to a portal to another world. A fantasy filled world, where dragons and elves and various other races exists.
What will he do after he enter another world? Will he be able to come back? And why this portal was opened?

Title: Author's Novel of Authority
Synopsis:
It's veri gud!
 
 
(Extreme randomness alert. I will judge you all, as my name is Author, and my one and only job is to criticise others. I fail at it, but I'll still make you feel like shit, so be ready for it!)

Title: Project Ordinal
Synopsis:
In a world where energy flows through the streams in the air and are given life by gemstones, a group of scientists find the Source. A unique object with the ability to change the world. Betrayals and failures errupt from within the group however and the empire is thrown into chaos. 
This story follows the ripple effects of the disasters that ensue.

Title: Ant in Magic World.
Synopsis:
As humans we live in a world where insect world is too small and insignificant to grab the attention of most of us.
But what if there is a world where there are no humans. A world where magical beings reign supreme, and intelligent monsters are the kings of their own kingdoms.
Where the phenomenon of mana has embedded so deep into everyone’s life’s that there are no beings left untouched by its powers. What kind of effect will this magical fuel have on the insects which on our Earth are considered important but nothing more than pests.
Will they gain intelligence to move according to their wills? Will they have thoughts and emotions to convey their thoughts? Can they talk and communicate with other species and live together in harmony or they fight the territorial war like we humans do?
Are they greedy for power, status and position or they are just simple organisms without much complexity and live by the days?
And what if a human soul with no memories, but the intricacies of his human life etched onto the core of his soul, gets to reincarnate into such world as an ant? Will he survive and become another emperor or will he die trying to live according to his ways of the past?
Monsteralia is one such world.

Title: Spell Bound
Synopsis:
“It wouldn’t be a lie to say that many of us want to change our lives for one reason or another. Power, money, lust, love, acceptance… loneliness.
Empty endless screaming loneliness; that was my reason. Loneliness that just didn’t go away no matter what I did or how hard I tried.
 
Maybe some of you can imagine how I felt, perhaps even felt it yourself or still do. It is a terrible feeling isn’t it? It can be maddening beyond belief.  
I remember sitting on the floor in the corner of my room staring at the endless white walls hating myself. The loneliness had gotten so bad I would just sit there and cry. I felt so alone, so isolated, so inadequate.
 
Would you run away from it all if this was your life? Would you try to change things? What my dear reader would you do?
 
This is the story of how I ran, how I lived, how I tried to change things and how I finally died. Dear reader this book is the story of my life and those around me. The knowledge I’ve gained, the wisdom I have acquired, my triumphs, my failures, those I loved and those I hated.
This book is all that I am and hoped to be. It is yours now, may it serve you well and guide you to a happier future than mine.”
 
         Excerpt taken from the journal of Kaden Vos also known as, “The Butcher of Rakan” 
 
 
--
I have been a long time reader and have always wanted to create something myself. I hope you all find this world I am creating fun and enjoyable. As I am new to this, any advice or feedback you have will be greatly appreciated and I will do my best to improve. My goal is a chapter a week, but sometimes it can be a bit tough with work and taking care of the family. Thank you all for reading.
--
PS: I take no credit for the new cover, you are an amazing artist whoever you are. I am only using it for a temp cover till I can make something myself.

Title: Death by any other name
Synopsis: A man who simply knows himself as Mortus wakes up in a dungeon surrounded by dead bodies. How did this happen, was he the one who caused this, did someone else do this to him? He had a million questions in his mind, but first, he had to find a way out of this dungeon.

Title: The story of Kun Kuo
Synopsis: There was once, a little fish that wanted to reach for the stars. The world turning out diffrent from his expectations the little fish decided to the only way to move forward was to pave a path of his own. Join this little fish on his journey in finding where he himself belongs.

Title: For the second time in my life, I got hired! —I longed for a normal job though…—
Synopsis:
Sectors check complete… all online.Connecting link——Link success.
Mana signature verification——Success.
Mana Field signature verification—Success.
OS launching——Welcome.
Projection—Online.
Sound—Online.
Replay…3..2..1…
 
“It’s been a year since I found this recording device… and I’ve decided to use it now… you see there’s something that I’ve never talk about since that incident a few years ago and I thought… why don’t I record like a diary or something? And so… here I am talking to a relic of a past… talking to a device akin to a video recorder… okay… here I go… 
I… am a reincarnator.
I died at the most happy day of my life… on the day I was going to be married (20 y/o). Well although I still have some regrets it was already in the past so there’s nothing I can do since I already reincarnated in this world. 
Let me tell you this… the life of a reincarnated is no sugar and rainbow, I would have died a thousand times over if I were careless, I got no cheat power from god and I was born on a family of adventurers, it’s an ordinary family that you can find anywhere in this world. Although in the end I was known as the Black  Avenger the strongest in the guild it was not because of god or convenient plot device, no… I worked my ass off throughout most of my life! I envy those OP MC that got their powers from god and some kinda plot device!! God I hate them!!!
 Fuu…fuu… calm down… I certainly spent 20 years of my life struggling and honing my skills to survive, and it’s worth it I don’t regret it even for one bit. 
The thing is I want to talk about my past in details but… maybe next time.
Okay! Enough gloomy talk and move on the the problem I’m currently facing, Currently I am living with a 11 years old girl… No kidding! A guy in mid twenties living with a cute little girl! And no I am not a lolicon. This little girl hired me for a certain job and because of some circumstances I have no choice but to take care of her. I wonder what will happen from now on? I hope everything is going to be okay… Oh she’s calling me maybe she’s hungry?”
——End Record 51——

Title: The heart of Arcturus
Synopsis: The story begins shortly after Eloiya and her comrades met a man called Alan. Alan has always known there was something different about him since he was young. Something that no others would believe him, not even his own parents. A hallow sense began to grow inside him as he became older and he soon began to realize his time has stopped in the past.When the world was placed upon his shoulders, the once, broken boy found home. He sought to protect what was his and maybe one day he could find back the past he lost.

Title: REC Company
Synopsis:
Enzel Venera was the greatest mercenary of all time, taking down armies, killing monsters, and destroying everything in his way through raw power and brute strength.
But that was years ago, during an age of war. Now, in the present, the nations enjoy a time of peace. Thus the era of adventurers began, causing mercenaries like him to drop in value. His golden age ended as soon as it begun.
As he staggered along a town, dying of starvation, he was saved by an angel. Unfortunately for him, it was no angel, it was just his former mercenary guildmate Rachel Mariner, bearing a violent grudge that would last for ages. During those days, he had always bullied her for being weak. Now, she owned an emporium and a workshop, and he was no better than a hobo.
Circumstances arose, and the strongest mercenary history ever knew was reduced to nothing more than her slave-- Employee. With fortune frowning down on him, how will Enzel survive his new life in this town?Temporary cover image by nobita. Source:
http://danbooru.donmai.us/posts/488026

Title: A Random Apocalypse
Synopsis:
Like the title says, a random apocalypse. No idea where this story is head, still in the development stage. Just wanted to have the prologue up, so to start being able to make drafts. More tags may be added as I write.
Synopsis for now: In a world similar to that of our Earth, the apocalypse has arrived. What will happen in it? Will the human race really degenerate to might=right? Will people die left and right? Will people really change their morals to adapt. Find out, in this random apocalypse.

Title: Golems Master
Synopsis: Hi my name is Lian, Lian Pyron, while I was walking on a rainy day a lightning bolt fell in front of me, scared I jumped back, suddenly another attacked me behind.And I thought, what are the chances of two lightning bolts falling so close to me?, While I thought about that another fall, and I screamed.Fuckkk,What have I done so bad what the thunderbolts they're trying to hit me?To answer my question, the clouds began to make very loud noises, and three rays began to fall behind me, scared I continued to run, while lightning after lightning fell behind, as if playing with me.I kept running for thirty minutes while I was being chased by lightning, and it did not matter where I hid myself they always held me.When suddenly a lightning bolt came towards me, trying to brake I ended up slipping and falling on the floor, the lightning struck right in front of me between my legs almost sticking my son, I looked at the sky and screamed.Shitttt,If you want to hit me, hit my head, not my son!Responding angrily, the clouds let out an even more self-pounding sound almost bothering my eardrums.And throwing thousands of rays in my direction from all directions giving me no chance to escape,looking at the sky shout.Fuckkkk!

Title: Modern World Mages
Synopsis:
Mages- a special group of humans, who can tap into arcane energy in the world. For thousands of years, humans have improved both their skills and magical powers to fight the enemy, threatening to destroy their world.
Shadows- a race of monsters from another world and the threat to human world. They are magical beings who both outnumber and overpower the mages.
For thousands of years, the two races have been at war and now, the end of it is getting near.
 
Azarath, now going by the name, Kane, an ex-mage, who left magic behind after his mentor died. He now lives his regular life with his girlfriend, but this life can't go on any longer, as his powers and knowledge is needed once again to destroy the growing darkness.
 
Warning: includes dark themes, gore, profanity and sexual content
NO NTR!!!

Title: Kingmaker
Synopsis:
This story is on hiatus/abandonned.
 
People die, then that's all... or at least, it should be that way. There may be anomalies, yes – the occasional hero of old getting reincarnated for some obscure purpose – but who knows what the gods are thinking. If they are thinking at all. If there are gods, to begin with.
What would explain such a mistake, then? The hero mark wasn't given to our reborn champion, but to his perfectly normal sister. A prank from these mindless gods, perhaps. Luckily for him, he was done with this hero business and had other plans for his new life, so it's all good... Here is the story of one who isn't meant to stand among heroes, kings and emperors anymore, yet will find himself holding power over them.

Title: Assimilating into Reality
Synopsis: The world is forcefully transformed by a strange yet incredibly advanced alien race.  Steven, a young college student, is caught up in this new reality.  A reality with monsters, magic, and everything in between.

Title: L.R.
Synopsis: This is the daily diary of I Lupus Rex. I would love to tell you more but that would just spoil things. You will just have to give me a chance and I will do my best to intrigue you.

Title: Survival Mage
Synopsis:
When ken was a young boy, he became insatiably fascinated by the arcane. The unknown to be more precise, and he loved anything mythical. Like any young boy, he was fascinated by the legends of dragons and gods. But where others were content with the bedtime stories, he was not.
When Ken accidentally unlocks his innate talents one day, he starts regretting his curiosity. While a whole new world of magic opens its doors to him, he realizes being a mage isn't all its cracked up to be.
In order for new mages to control their newfound powers, they are forced into an academy to learn control and to provide better growth for their ability. Alas, there is an entry exam one must pass. But not all who enter will leave.
Depending on overall score during the exam, your allotted a certain amount of resources at the academy. How do you gain more points? By killing your peers, or providing enough entertainment.
Author Note: Unsure where this is going yet, just having fun writing.
PS, The cover is from Google. I don't know whos it is, but it looks awesome and fits the theme. If anyone does know, or it is yours, please don't sue me. On the other hand, if anyone sends me a fanart version, that'd be cool too.

Title: Tales of a Future God
Synopsis: There exist four powers in the world. Heaven, Underworld, Sea and Land. Triton is the son of Poseidon and the heir to the Sea. However, all he dreams about is to go the land above water where humans live. He wants to become an adventurer and is fiercely infatuated with human females although he's never seen one. He has heard of Zeus and his affairs with human queens and is deeply determined to claim his own female human one day. Follow the son of the Sea god as he travels across the lands and learns what really matters, meeting humans, beasts and deities alike.

Title: Re: Hero's Weapons: Reborn
Synopsis:
*Not good for kids under 18. Gore and such. I mean it. Unless you can handle it. I can. I'm the author.*
Have you ever wondered what life would be like as a heros weapon?
"Where is this place?!"
Steven was your ordinary person. Had a good life, job, family, he had is good.
That was until he died. Not by a truck, falling, or heart attack. He was murdered.
That was the time when his life got hella alot worse. Now being able to turn into a sword and a shield, he makes the oath to find his way back home, convince his sister that he's her brother, and maybe pick up a Harem of two along the way.
*Contains reference to other Royal Road stuff, and anime and manga.*
(Some has been rewritten to make sense)

Title: An Open Door
Synopsis: Dropped.

Title: Unfettered Path of the Slayer
Synopsis:
'Destiny had never been kind. Fate decides how far we can reach. Opportunites, however, are for the ones who are prepared to change their destiny.'
This is what Krad Lee believes. Blessed by the heavens, a young talented man who seeks the pinnacle of happiness. Bound by fate, can he truly gain what he desires?

Title: Hakai no tengoku
Synopsis: Royce, the protagonist, had been hit by a speeding car and has now fallen into the afterlife with his friend Vivian. They will encounter new threats more allies and a new perilous journey in the afterlife where everything is not as it seems.

Title: NEET Re:Quest High School
Synopsis: What would happen to NEET’s like Sora, one of the biggest shut-ins to be seen in the history of mankind if he would be forced to enroll back into a strict iron ruled High School? Sora’s wits and superior intellect has brought him thus far in life peacefully, only to be ruthlessly torn apart and tested against rich and hitherto sheltered high-class girls, which also by all means and cost want nothing to do with the newly enrolled NEET’s which are seen as trespassers on an all-girls High School. How many NEET’s will be able to complete the ultimate questlines awaiting them, with the biggest one lying in wait in which Sora yet had to face, a three year timeline graduation quest in order to return to his tranquil days of gaming solitude.

Title: The queen of pirates
Synopsis:
You know, I never thought I would be reincarnated into another world, but when gods says he'll send me to the word of my choice. I 'decided' to go to one piece and become the queen of pirates !
I Naka D. Ruri will become the queen of pirates !
 
( Cover looks like what i imagine Ruri in my head, I don't own the art and one piece )

Title: Apotheosis Road
Synopsis: Four fallen angels cast out of heaven for wrongs brought towards one of the seven Archangels must seek redemption to enter back into heaven by serving as protectors of Earth, eliminating horrific creatures of legend and of folklore. They gather a small band of human believers together into a biker group called "Apotheosis Road" and through the course of events the angels learn what it truly means to have a family, an unbreakable bond of brotherhood even the deepest darkness cannot pierce, and of the true horrors that the night can bring.

Title: Outlands
Synopsis:
The Outlands stand as twisting spires of stone and cracked earth under an emerald sky, warped by feral magic and scorched by searing sun. Emaciated creatures scurry through its gullies and across its plains, feeding off what meager tufts of grass they can find. At night the darkness comes to life, shadows churning from an ages old curse.
Sin's Curse.
A lone hunter stalks these plains. In his bones are memories of ages past. In his blood burns searing vengeance. His people cry out for revenge, for he is the last of their number.
These are his lands, and he will claim his birthright.

Title: Dungeon of the mindless
Synopsis:
what is the price of life?
- To the gods not much.  when Matt dies he finds himself in a glowing, white and endless room while a voice deems him only just worthy to be reborn as a dungeon heart. How will Matt change to the new world he has been born into. how will Matt grow as a person ( well not a person but you know as his reborn self)? will Matt become powerful or is he just going to be winging it? I'm betting on the latter.

Title: World of Wishes
Synopsis:
"I will grant one wish every ten years, but there are some rules that must be followed first..."
The year is 2432 and it has been over onehundred years since a tree appeared in the center of the atlantic ocean.  The age of nuclear weapons and advanced technology has passed due to the tree's arrival. Due to the massive size and inexplicable abilities of the tree, mankind named it "Yggdrasil."

Title: Reborn Magician Tyrant [Old]
Synopsis:
Author's Note #4: This is the old, hastily written version.
A great magician from the Human Kingdom travels west to fight the Demon Kingdom. Finally, after eight long years of war, the Human Kingdom emerges triumphant! 
But, just as the Human Kingdom begins to celebrate the victory, an enemy from a land far to the east attacks! 
After rushing to help support the Human Kingdom capital against the assault, the magician is met with the sight of his beloved city razed to the ground. The magician fights off whatever invaders he can, using whatever tactics he knows, but he is eventually felled in combat due to the superior abilities of the invaders.
However, death is not the end! The magician reincarnates, awakening as a citizen of the empire which conquered his home!
Author's Note #3: Okay, that's the end for me. This is too boring for me to continue writing, and I've gotten back to writing Reborn as a Dungeon Core in an Apocalyptic World. At 26,772 words, this has gotten too boring for me to continue. I'm probably going to take this basic story and rewrite it into something way better w/ longer chapters, but at least I had fun for the six days it took to write this much.
PS - Love the reviews; they're great. Way to go, dude with 22 thumbs up and 0 thumbs down!

Title: Warriors Heart
Synopsis:
9 Year old Erik's life take a dramatic turn when the little village he lives in is destroyed by a warband. He gets captured and is brought as a slave to a quarry in the foreign and warm Southern Land.
The years pass by and Eric grows stronger and stronger. Slowly he starts to understand that he is not just a normal farmboy. Destiny has something else ready for him...

Title: The Demon Emperor
Synopsis:
Book:
The path of The Demon Emperor is a life of bloodshed, hatred and loneliness. And namely this path, Boe Nas was chosen to tread. Having sunk into a sorrow and lost a will to live, he turns his heart to seeking power to avenge his pain. Formidable, insurmountable power that can put the entire world on the knees. And such desire leads him to meet The Strongest, whose entity is far beyond any known limits. Boe becomes his new disciple and begins his road to the true power. But in his seekings, he must prove himself worthy and go through a number of trials under keen sight of The Strongest. Where will this fate bring him? Will Boe stand on the top of the world or is he a mere toy in hands of The Strongest?
 
The original art for cover is made by theboyofcheese a.k.a. Benjamin Ee

Title: Artisan
Synopsis:
Hi everyone, really, really sorry for disappearing on you guys, illness lead to a deep depressive episode that I'm still struggling with.
Been thinking about coming back to revamp/finish writing Artisan and noticed a kind reader pointing out my work has been stolen and published on Amazon.
The offending novel is The Artisan by Jon Moremont - obviously a GoT fan who didn't even read the blurb properly and put a wizard on the cover.
Just wanted to let everyone know that this book has nothing to do with me, and has no new content.
Thanks, and sorry again - LF

Superhero Litrpg Skills, level-ups, powers, crafting, and base-building.
Releasing a chaplet daily, ~1,200 words.

It is 2054 and unemployment is at an all-time high. In the era of the quantum computer, autonomous systems have taken over as the backbone of the workforce. Justin, 20 years old and unemployed, has nothing holding him back, and since his government stipend will cover the expense, he signs up to play Imagitech's brand new game: A Time of Heroes.
Justin has never been that into multiplayer games, but for a full-immersion virtual reality where he can play a Superhero, Justin is definitely in.
'Superheroes and Villains are on the rise in an alternate America of 2020. Forces of good and evil must band together to control the future'.
Justin plays Artisan, an alien AI trapped on Earth.Inventor, hacker, and gadgeteer to a team of heroes.

Hope you enjoy.
Please feel free to leave reviews and comments.

Title: The Tentacle of Fate
Synopsis: The tale of the Human Empire, the Demon Empire, and the Alliance of Beastmen is a tale as old as time itself. It was a tale of war, of love, of hatred -especial of the racial variety- and it was a tale that the races scattered across the globe thought would never end until a single species would reign supreme. Yet at times it seems that truth is stranger than fiction, they never expected the world would be united in the most unexpected of ways...

Title: The End
Synopsis: Fate has not been kind to Wei. Born in the slum and stealing to survive. His only destiny being death, He will still shine brighter that a sun in the dark night only seen by the moon.

Title: Unlucky in Love
Synopsis: Queensguard, avid explorer, self-proclaimed comedian and almost-genius Sir Dangou Sheen would have lived a worry-free and satisfying life, if he wasn't so unlucky in love. Being single all his life, Dangou thought it wise to confess to his beautiful-beyond-words Queen, but was left unanswered. This is his story after that "rejection", as he and his sword Osiro's journey to find a solution to his lifetime of dry spells once and for all turns into an extraodinary tale of violence, betrayal, love and misfortune.

Title: Lord of all vamps
Synopsis:
A normal boy with a dream to become a vampire, what happens when he dies and get the choice to reincarnate, he gets to choose where, when, and as what. What will he do and go with I will do whatever I please protagonist.
I do not own the cover if the owner wants the cover removed message or email me. Art owned by deviant art. By thefuckingseaturtle.all credit of image goes to the owner.

Title: Gaming Paragon
Synopsis: The professional gamer Alvin, after experiencing an accident went a complete turnaround in his career. With his performance on the decline, the once legendary player who have marked the pinnacle of competitive gameplay was fired out of his club. And thus, becoming unemployed. Losing all hope but not his strength, one day a technological invention which shooked the world in its very foundation has changed his life once again. Using his skill and knowledge, he shall pave a path towards glory!

Title: Cores
Synopsis: Magic came to our planet, along with gates to another world. When creatures are found to have an organ known as a core, an extremely dense energy source, Lucas finds his chance to avoid the tedium of a desk job: monster hunting. All he has to do is not die.

Title: The Incredibly Lazy and Extremely Depressed Mr. Benedict In Another World
Synopsis: A depressed 23-year-old man dies from heart failure and is reincarnated in a fantasy world. Will he be destroyed or rise to great heights- or forsake both?

Title: Vermin Lore
Synopsis:
*'The System's' POV*
Egocentric humans, are the parasites of the plane "Eden" which they, with much audacity, refer to as Earth.  They have done too much damage and destruction to Gaia, the embodiment of nature, the deital guardian mother. To name a few, overpopulation, creators of nuclear machinations, material  wastage, environmental  demolition, cruelty and obliteration of other species(even to themselves!)
Unmatched and unchallenged by predators of equal standing, they festered and corrupted much of everything. Little do they know that Eden is dying. And so is the Otherworld. A world of myths and legends. It is therefore, through my righteous powers, let both worlds be fused to save both! As I decree, And so shall it be done!
Now that I think about it, since pests such as yourselves are treating the world as your playground, why not make a game out of this? Ahahahaha!~ So! Amuse me humans. Tell me the tale of your quest for survival! Unlock the powers i've scattered all throughout the new world. 
 
Show me...the Lore of Vermins!

Title: Re:Absorb
Synopsis:
Abandoned. Do not read. Only kept because the first chapter is so ridiculous it makes me laugh-
I do not own cover photo.
Author Note: This site my first time ever writing. Please forgive me...

Title: The Tutorial
Synopsis:
A young man from Earth finds himself waking up in a mystical forest that vaguely looks like a setting in a largely popular game from his world. He discovers that he's been transported in the clothes that he was wearing before the incident and having no possessions with him besides his phone. Upon closer inspection, all apps on his phone have either been removed or are unable to function except for the app indicating the text function. There's a bright red circle with a white '!' in the center, telling him that there's been a new message for him. When he opens the app, he's met with:



???: ayy buddy


???: u've just been sent 2 another world 


???: lucky u!


???: i'll b ur guide 4 this journey & hopefully u'll b more successful 


???: unlike the others before u


???: they didn't like 2 listen



He stares at the messages. Rereading them again and again, waiting for this mysterious person to send another and explain in further detail. After a couple minutes with no new messages, the young man snorts and puts his phone down before getting off the ground to start his adventure in this new world.
 
A/N: Super quick warning, the author is lazy, new, and a lousy writer. BE WARNED BEFORE READING.

Title: All I want is a hole!
Synopsis: You know what I mean don't you

Title: Tales of a main character
Synopsis: The story of a main character who breaks the 4th wall too many times. Doesn't co-operate with the author. Is Unfunny and gives too many philosophical thoughts and trivia.

Title: Queen Of Belzar
Synopsis:
A monster warlord got into an accident and got herself sent to a strange new world where her race is not dominating the world, so what should she do?
Of course just take it over again maybe?

Title: How infinite is infinity?
Synopsis:
Max was a normal guy. A normal guy who just happend to be the king of the biggest empire in the universe. Of course, he also was an unredeemable fantasy addict and had a twisted sense of morality, but he was still normal.
All was good and well untill he got his hands on a weapon capable of destroying the universe itself. What did he do with it? Well, he was having a depressed moment and he activated the bomb.
Thus, in the afterlife, he got the ability to do whatever he wants. What will he do with infinite power? Will the saying [Absolute power absolutely corrupts] come true?

Heavily inspired by [Ultimate Power, by Deuxz]. Also from some other things I read, but most of the stuff is out from my fantasies and desires.

Title: Sorry, Those Powers Won't Fix Your Problems!
Synopsis:
One day Jacob Harroway gained a magic power. Now he's the target of assination attempts from an unknown source. He'll have to form a ragtag group of fellow power users in order to fight back against whoever wants him dead.
.
.
cover art source- https://www.redbubble.com/people/kernalkrispy?ref=side-nav-account&asc=u

Title: When the Lilyflower blooms...
Synopsis:
In a modern world where magic and status boards exist, twenty-three-year-old S-Class Archmagus Aria Saciustrum found herself in the morbid situation of joining her country’s own Dungeon Dive expedition. A researcher at heart, Aria didn’t like the idea of slogging away in the dirty depths of the petrifying dungeons that spawned all over the world. 
 
However, her scientific mind trumped her own feelings, and she forced herself to join her country’s first S-Class Dungeon Dive. The allure of finding a treasure or a discovery that could shake the foundations of human society was too enticing to just walk away. 
 
So… Aria dived deep into the Dungeon, alongside her friend the S-Class Healer Yvette, and yes, her efforts had paid off. The S-Class party did manage to find a groundbreaking discovery. One that would shake the foundations of the world and would haunt the nightmares of everyone living on Planet Earth. 
 
Just… It wasn’t what Aria had hoped for...

???

New chapters every Monday, Wednesday, Friday and Sunday at GMT+8 0100

Title: The Friendly Neighborhood Nightmare Caller
Synopsis:
The year is 21XX, humanity still seems to love killing each other over some pointless war or another. VR Dive technology is a thing and has more uses than just fun and games.For the past year, humanity has temporarily put aside its differences to fight a new threat, the Fiends, an enemy of unknown origins. The Fiends seem to have an unlimited reserve of forces, yet they seem to primarily attack small human settlements, with the occasional siege on a city with a vast horde.Humanity has resorted to creating Saviors, ex-humans who have extraordinary powers and who's forms generally resemble some form of human-monster hybrid. They range from ordinary superhumans and slime people to harpies and golems, as well as, from plant people and zombies to kitsunes and arachne.While they are called Saviors, their official title is the Defenders of Humanity and they serve the Human Collective Government Defense Force.Now, what happens when one of the biggest unknowns of the Fiends' forces, the Fiendish Maidens, joins the HCGDF?This story follows Savior Squad 108-F, a squad of misfits who joined the Defense Force for a variety of reasons, as they live their lives and go on missions for the "greater good" of humanity. During their adventures, they meet one of the most elusive Fiends in existence: the Nightmare Caller Eve, one of the Fiendish Maidens.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This story was created using the world of a pair of "Create Your Own Adventures", called Defenders of Humanity and Ravagers of Humanity. There are four of us working together to write this story, so you may notice differences in writing styles, though we will try to make it seem like one style.
All credit for any pictures we use, go to their artists.
We plan to update as we complete chapters, however fast that happens to be. Sorry for any inconsistencies.

Title: Zero plus Zero equals One
Synopsis:
The World where war is no longer a war.
In such world, trust has become nothing but a meaningless fault in humanity. 
Everlasting Gore has numbed the humans. 
Clouds covered the sky, where the sky has lost its purpose.
"Happiness comes from war, and freedom comes from death."
0+0=1

Title: Era'Lis
Synopsis:
Troubled by the memories of another, Vyrian struggles to find his place in life.
(no this is not a reincarnation story)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
I'm still new to writing so constructive critiscism as well as notifications of incorrect grammar, spelling and weirdly written sentences are welcome.
Also, a bad habit of mine is making a story too fast paced. What should span several chapters takes a few paragraphs. I see some other authors here do it and it irks the hell outta me so please tell me if I lapse into this habit as well.

Title: Dauntless
Synopsis: A young boy's home is lost in a fire. Amidst the flames, a man that the boy had never met before appears. He offers to take the boy in, explaining that he needs the boy's help to overcome his weakness. The boy, with no one else to turn to, decides to follow the man. The man raises him wthin a labyrinth of tunnels, leaving the boy with little knoweldge of the world. At first, the boy finds peace in his new life. After a time, however, the man's desire to lessen his fears takes a dark turn.

Title: Submissive World
Synopsis: What would you do...? I wonder what the mighty readers that rule the world of RoyalRoadl would do in my situation... let me ask you what would you do if you had a sister with a split personality issue that kept on torturing you, a mother that once was the center of your world, your rock, become a crazy bitch fucking every men who pop up in front of her, and unable to take care of herself... A nonexistent father, of course or else it wouldn't be a real issue...I'm so desperate that I just want to sleep...once, just once without worrying about waking up filed with bruises, black eyes, broken limbs, gunshot wounds...And whatever kind of injuries you could think of, I probably had...No wonder I'm so "weird", and so pessimistic...I'm just a hopeless wreck...

Title: Wit
Synopsis:
A group of 5 seventeen year olds are teleported into a vast island with nothing but themselves to figure out how they are going to survive.
Soon enough, they discover they are not alone.
It's the ultimate battle of wit.

Title: Tale of The Antihero (Rewritten)
Synopsis: Iseria; a world where all myths come to life. Where fantasical beings roam the earth and strength determines everything. A boy who died on Earth is reborn in such a world. With the goal of fulfiling a promise he himself dose not remember. This is his story.

Title: The Abandoned Disciple
Synopsis:
Relic's entire world consisted of only himself and his master.
Although he wasn't the strongest nor the most talented, the two spent their passing days happily in each other's comapny. So then why did one day his master decided to abandon him and destroy any hopes of him living? His questions are soon answered and even though though he was abandoned, he will not abandon his master! 
”I will accept whatever reasoning master gives me….But if she still needs me, then I will spend my entire life to fulfill her wish. ” 
 
"place holder cover"

Title: Nova Stella
Synopsis:
Aeolia, the sky continent that's shrouded with magic and mystery.A place where the skies are dominated by Sky Ships.Join our heroes as they strive to be the best of who they want to be.Experiencing hardships and overcoming them.This is an adventure in a world where freedom can be felt the most in the sky.
 

Daily chapters until the first arc ends.
I hope you enjoy. :)

Title: Chronicles of Zach
Synopsis: Zach is a man that gets thrown for a loop as his world and everything he knows is turned upside down. Everything he ever knew has changed, for good or bad, well that has yet to be determined.

Title: Pagebreak
Synopsis:
Jean loved books but the world didn't. Unable to find enough books in her own world, Jean stumbles upon the House of Wisdom - a massive library in the magical world of Illustair. In Illustair, books are the source of magic and now Jean has more books than she could ever hope to read as well as access to magic beyond her wildest dreams!
What could possibly go wrong?
SEASON TWO WILL COME AFTER A QUICK REWRITE! Like the story? Vote for it on TopWebfiction!
If you would like to follow it on my website, please click here. Additional genres: Drama, Tragedy.

Title: Dantian: The Unforgettable
The Random Mysterious Satirical Chronological Amazingly Dangerous Spin Off Offf Offff The Life Of Alexander and Wyatt
Synopsis:
I literally made this name 3 years ago when I was a cringy little kid have mercy T.T . I'm now however bringing this story back to life. These two characters represent the two dark sides that make me a neutral person.

The best phrase to describe this story would be: "You either die a hero or you live long enough to see yourself become the villain."

Please always read between the lines, I tend to give many small hints to the bigger picture ;)


Two beings separated at birth, Alexander and Wyatt. The prophecy child and the young troublemaker no one expects to have a few screws loose. One destined for greatness, willing to throw it all away to find his own adventure. Another thrown away, looking for greatness to prove them all wrong. While going through unspeakable difficulties will they stay the same person that simply wanted something for themselves



Inspired by King Zahard from Tower Of God and Gon from Hunter x Hunter

Title: Majority Rule
Synopsis:
Readers choose from a selection of options for participants of a survival game show known as "Can Anyone Beat Level 10?". Each level has some monsters to kill and a boss at the end. Treasure chests and traps are available. Treasure chests, if opened successfully, give decent weapons, first aid kits, etc. If unsuccessful, treasure chests will either explode, taking some health from player or do become permanently closed. Monsters in dungeon levels depend on the theme of the week. This game show occurs on the first week of every month. The game just showed up out of nowhere and many people were interested in it as they attended the live version of the show. As for its mysteries...well, who knows? Maybe someone will solve them some day. But, for now, let the games begin!
This is a story that depends on the votes of the viewers using the poll system. I will probably wait a week or so per poll in order to accumulate enough votes. After the week is up, viewers can still vote but it won't affect the story. This is my first interactive fiction so it might not be on par with the better ones. Nevertheless, I hope you enjoyed reading this story. Thanks.

Title: Fallacy of Fate
Synopsis:
When the kid was born, they say the demons came for him. That there was an entire city destroyed. Powers not seen since old-and-gone ages clashed.
Some, though, whisper that the demons tried to save him. Tried to save him from a fallacy of fate. Tried to save him from the gods themselves. 
Tried and failed.
The dust settled and it became clear everything revolved around him, that the higher powers had been piqued. In a land ruled by gods, one born among the ruins of their preciously crafted cities clawed into their clutches. This wasn’t ordained. Uncertainty was introduced, then overlooked by the governing forces behind the world. They looked down in morbid curiosity. The gods themselves grew complacent in their seemingly omnipotent power in past ages. They now grow careless and bored. Just enough to leave the boy alive to see what would happen next.

Title: The Overlord
Synopsis: Joseph Amida started off as a slave, forced to fight as a gladiator for the corrupt god Brutus. He fought everyday, slowly gaining power. He then led a rebellion, slaying Brutus and his followers. From there he was attacked by a group of gods, seeking revenge for their fallen friend. He ruthlessly hunted them to the last man. He kept growing in power, determined to never be below anyone ever again. To never be another's pawn. He kept growing in power, mastering every weapon to it's peak. Forging treasures and pills in moments. Controlling the many and vast powers of the universe as easy as breathing. He kept becoming stronger, until no one could ever hope to match him in power. However, he then had to face an invincible enemy...boredom. For the top was truly a lonely existence, and boredom is an inescapable and undefeatable enemy. Thus, he desperately tries to find a way to quench his boredom, when it comes in a most unexpected way...

Title: A man's best friend
Synopsis:
This is the story about James Tanner, or to be precise, what he will become. You see, James is not the type of person to be the main character of any story. He is a 23 year old wallflower content with living in the shadow, no friends, no family, no lover and no real goals. for the past 7 years he has had a goldfish he named Peter. In James' mind this goldfish has a personality, goals, plans, thoughts and everything that he found lacking in himself. However, to anyone else it is just a goldfish.
One day when james is out for groceries, his landlord comes by to collect rent. After knocking on the door and not being answered he enters the apartment to see if james is around. He spots the goldfish on the counter and without any second thought flushes it down the toilet. No pets means: No pets.
Returning home James finds his empy fishbowl and naturally enters a psychotic breakdown, 36 hours of blood and gore later he's shot and killed by the police. This is not where the story of James and Peter ends, it's where it begins as he finds himself brought to a new world with new posibilities and his best friend right beside him, Although... didn't something get mixed up?!
 
Writing this story as a passtime, no fixed schedule, no promises.. ;o

Title: The Legendary Mr. Spencer
Synopsis:
Mr. Spencer.A man of many names...Of many wrinkless...And few hair...(-I'm making up on quality.-)A man somewhat controvensial.A man...A geezer...(-Hey! I heard that fella.-)A retired war veteran fighting in Korea, Vietnam and some say even World War I.(-Oh damn you! I'm not that old...-)A man of many skills and professions who accumulated a fair share of knlowladge through his life long, long life - from building tanks, repairing guns and patching up wounds to solving crosswords, napping and making bubble wraps.(-Mention my words boy. You never know when a bubble wrap can save your life.-)Yes. And a self proclaimed master of survival.(Well boy. I AM HERE AM I NOT?)His life motto is "Be always prepared for the worst and you won't need a blood transfusion"(-True.-)Yes... This is one of HIS stories.(-Amen-)
***
I was NOT inspired by the original Mr. Spencer. I just heard that name in a comic sketch and it felt so right for an old man. I didn't even know about it until typing it in the browser.

But before he can find it, a mysterious player who claims to be from the dead city of Jaurez arrives, with a plan to find the Developer, and gain the power to fight the decadent moderators.

Title: The modern day plague doctor
Synopsis: The world has become an rpg. Monsters have decended and destroyed the world. A year after the end survivors have come together and formed their own nations and kingdoms around the globe. Finding peace and comfort after so long. But when someone becomes sick and healing magic won't work they use medicine. But what do you do when you run out of medicine. The next choice would be a doctor. But with new species comes new diseases and only one man can help you then. A man with a plague doctor mask carrying a old medicine case.

Title: Further Than The Sky
Synopsis:
A penal squad composed of the military's worst. Incompetent soldiers,  traitors, war criminals, here is where they are gathered to be sent out to die. In the eyes of the world, their worth is close to zero. They only exist to undertake missions that would otherwise be suicide for the normal man.

An experimental program consisting of talented teenagers.  These young women showed promise and potential, giving hope to the possibility of commandeering the HG-07 Gibril, a machine that brought devastation upon the lands through the Gravity Well Incident.

They stand on opposite ends of the battlefield. 

However, everything is flipped on its head when both parties take in a new recruit into their ranks. Little did they know of the ties these seemingly ordinary people had to the event that almost destroyed the world.

Title: The Uprising
Synopsis:
Laventus Darex, also known as Darx, is the fourth prince of The Empire. In this world of swordcraft and magic, even a farmer had a mana level of at least 2. Darx, however, had none. That's right, he couldn't use magic since birth and was thus mocked by his family and friends. Of course, as much as possible, he tried to hide that fact and focused on his skills with the blade and tongue. Fortunately for him, due to his uselessness he was seen as harmless and could roam freely. As time passed, people simply ignored his presence.
Deep down, however, was a dark desire to kill all those who mocked him and made his life dull. He dreaded this world and hated its creations - himself included, sometimes. What will manifest when the four empires break into all out war? What will manifest when he is locked away, forsaken and forgotten by all? 
As the world burns and almost razes to the ground, Darx won't just stand idly by. He will clutch it by the throat and fuck it. Forcefully.

Title: Returning Aether
Synopsis:
Daman, an avid gamer hopes to one day be hired by the famous gaming company Warp. Famous for its popular VRMMORPG games, he wishes that he can be put in the credits for future game titles that will change the world once again. Now, sitting in his college dorm Damian registers to the newest VR game released called Aether. 
He gets lucky and finds out he is the 100th player to register and is given a choice of whether choosing a special class or a mystery prize. Selecting the prize, he logs in and finds out that he got transported to the world of Aether, but before he can celebrate he realises that it's not all fun and games.
 
Aether isn't the so called virtual world, it's a world that has been bought by a God and turned into a game for thousands of humans on Earth to play. Villagers are forced to follow the Systems rules or be sentenced to deletion and to entertain its players. Players run around causing havoc and sacrificing NPC's to level up and complete quests, what will Damian do when he finds out that he's an NPC and not a Player?
Follow Damian as he tries to go against the System and reclaim what used to be the NPC's world by ruining all the fun.

Title: This Isn't A Game Anymore!!!
Synopsis:
My first story on RRL, this is gonna be a bit... experimental. MC gains game character abilities. What makes it different, is that the setting is our current world. As in, no hidden society of superpowered martial artists or magicians, literally, just contemporary Earth. ... I'm hoping that this doesn't just turn into a horrible, horrible piece of Mary Sue fanfiction... As against that, I estimate this will wrap up in a couple of weeks or months worth of writing, so I'm pretty confident in completing this project! :)
Some inspiration taken from "The Gamer" and "One Punch Man".

He finds himself in plenty of trouble, such as getting himself caught up with the common 'bullies', or even something as complex as getting himself involved with a 'robbery.' Well, that doesn't really matter anymore! Why, Okirou finds himself dead! Fortunately for Okirou, God has decided to lay mercy upon his lonely soul, deciding to give him another chance. This time, in a world of complete 'fiction'. So Wait, I Was Given A Second Chance, In a World of Fantasy?!

Title: Peter and the Computer Imp
Synopsis:
Foreword    
    This is an adventure story in which the main protagonists are a group of five children who are close friends. The world has been invaded by a group of immortal evil being. A good immortal being enlists the five friends to engage the evil invaders in.. At stake is the fate of the human race. The story does not contain profanity, sex and gore, since it is intended to provide wholesome entertainment for children and adults, particularly those who are young at heart. 
 
                                                              Prologue
     It was a dark night when the greatest evil being of the universe landed on a remote mountain peak in Peru bringing his four assistants whom he addressed as Number One, Two, Three and Four. They in turn called him as the Boss. On landing on terra firma they all assumed human shape. The Boss had considerable magical powers, could travel billions of light years in the blink of an eyelid, and all five of them were immortal.
     They went about their task of enslaving the human race by using their magical powers to control the minds of many people from the surrounding area and arming them with magical guns. Soon South America was under their absolute control and they were preparing to conquer the whole world. This would have dire consequences for the human race. The Boss would gradually drain the mental energy of all human beings till they were reduced to the level of animals. Then he would travel with his assistants to some other planet harboring intelligent life and repeat the same process there.
     Fortunately, the greatest good being of the universe arrived on the earth to thwart their evil intentions. He also acquired human shape and called itself the Chimp because of a slight resemblance to that creature. Since the laws of nature did not permit direct conflict between these two great beings, the Chimp searched for suitable humans to battle against the evil invaders.
     After considerable effort, he decided that a group of five young American children from the small town of South Bend were best suited for this purpose. Their leader was Peter Edwards, a boy with a well rounded personality and a flair for computers. The others were his close friends Anthony Sebastian, Monique Danville, Mathew Rossi, and Roger Steinberg. All of them were very brave and highly talented. One night the Chimp appeared mysteriously in Peterâ€™s bedroom to enlist him and his friends.

Title: Sturdy Bones
Synopsis: He was summoned by none other than Ozeroth Kazaar, the seeker of destruction and world-acclaimed greatest necromancer of all time. Thought to be but a normal foot soldier from the mass summon, a skeleton of the lowest class, he is put to work in the smiths like a slave. Who knew an ancient artifact had merged in his nucleus the moment he was pulled from the underworld, giving him the power to evolve without limit…

Title: The Soul Binder an Expansion Story
Synopsis:
Welcome to the 15th expansion of Earth!
 
After the Modern World expansion we realized there was no true goal for the players, and the unbalance of certain weapons using gunpowder. We have chosen to get rid of gunpowder as it goes away from a skill based system letting weaker members take down stronger ones through luck. Reverting back to simpler systems was a hard choice for us, but I do believe this will provide you with a more satified experience.
 
Due to people having to relearn a lot of things, we have icreased the first year's skill advancement system, and have used the life of everyone under the age of ten to revert all of the current players back to ten. 
 
Good luck players! Have fun rebuilding society, and fighting against a force that can tear those societies appart.

Title: To appear, to arise, to become, or to be, but literally, it means to stand out.
Synopsis: Life, people and thoughts- He was rather numb to existence. Like being infinitely tired.-Or bored. The only time he actually felt like he was living was in his dreams.And first he would sleep comfortably numb. On bad nights he would dream about his past or things he wishes to (have) happen(ed). Lately he dreams about different things. Things he’s never seen before but only heard about from stories or crappy novels. He dreams about different tales on people who live different lives under different circumstances. He likes to dream about different worlds.“I want to go. Somewhere... far maybe?—yeah, real far. “

Title: Inter-dimensional House Travel
Synopsis: A man of Justice, that was what he tried to become, not by trying to become a police officer or a law man. but by trying his best to help other people. but nothing has ever happened to his expectations and he hated it. maybe he could be a better person after he went back home, just maybe. but that was just something that would never come to be.

Title: Royal Brothers: Fate of a Kingdom
Synopsis:
The fate of Agreth rests on two brothers. One the King, the other the Traitor, each fought fiercely in an intense battle. If the duel didn't happen, war would consume Agreth as each brother sends their troops to their bloody deaths. Thus the duel occurred on the highest stage possible - the Royal Palace. The King's Crown in plain sight, each fought with their love, life, ideas on the line. Neither family is safe, and when one of the brother's two little boys manage to slip away, the entire Kingdom holds a dangerous threat.
 
Will the boys become a repeat of their uncle and father? Or will they unite for the greater good of Agreth? Or perhaps they'll even destroy it.

Synopsis:

During his reincarnation, he gets a chance to become a user of the Mercenary System, which allows him to keep his memory from his past life and gain points to upgrade his stats, but in return he must fulfill ridiculous missions or side quests from god in order to earn those points. Watch Ray, or now Lena, in her second life full of adventure, magic and maybe a little too much excitement as she struggle to finish those missions.

Title: Tales of the Known
Synopsis: Humans had spread throughout the known universe. Naturally, they divided the known into territories based on different ideals and philosophies. Several regimes rose to power. Unfortunately, no matter how much they obtained, nothing quenched their thirst for more. Follow the tales of the mighty as they use diplomacy, war and any other means necessary to become the sovereign ruler of the known and unknown universe. Lisbeth Hasko is an expert miner who wants nothing but a peaceful life and a drink from time to time. A woman of many faces, an eccentric and the most wanted criminal of the Systematic Government, arguably the most powerful regime of the known. Will she ever be able to flee from her heinous past and live on or will the ghosts of her past devour her? Follow Lisbeth as she helps her apprentice, a broken young boy, find a place in the vast universe to call home.

Title: SWORDs

Title: The Four Knights of Eden
Synopsis:
Betrayal to one's own species for self gain. Unwittingly, how human. Despite the evolution and advancement of mankind, ultimately, they remained pebbles on the side of the road in relation to the truly primordial entities in the universe. In response, they conspired and warred against each other, which fundamentally ended in the fall of humanity.
That simply sets the context of our story.
The World of Eden. What happens when war follows you through an entirely different universe? This is their story.
 
P.S. This is my first story so there might be some mistakes I make so please bear with me. I do welcome *constructive* criticism but do try to take it easy on me.

Title: Inter Dimensional Time Travelers
Synopsis: A troubled youth find himself dragged into an adventure not bounded by time or space.

Title: Cold Blood
Synopsis:
The year is 2055, the Third World War is long over and the world is split between the West and the East. 22 year old Bastion Woods, a prodigy and genius Australian sniper, is killed in action during a mission in Baghdad, leaving behind his family and long-time friend and partner Katrina Williams. Is he satisfied with his death? Of course not, not many are, and Bastion finds himself in a plain white field. He is told that he will begin a new life by the Gods, and all was well, but could a story really end so easily? Of course not!
The so called 'Gods' were the game developers, and he is to spend his second life as an NPC in the up-and-coming VRMMORPG 'Cold Blood', a game based on a dystopian world filled with guns and ruined cities. For the chance to meet his loved ones, he will endure, he will improve, he will kill, and he will survive in this new world.

Title: Insect Dungeon vs The World. (On Hiatus!)
Synopsis:
He woke up scared and lonely, but an angel came to save him from the darkness.
She told him it was okay, and he believed her. But before they could enjoy their lives a little, bad things started happening one after another.
Murderers, maniacs and leachers started attacking him for their pride, grief and some for simple fun.
He protected himself from the dangers and she guided him on the path.
They passed days like this for some time, but then those stupid humans released the ancient evil, and the target they choose... It was him.

Yes, this is a rewrite. But please save yourself the trouble of reading the original, this is miles apart form that and better. Though it is your choice.
Schedule: Three/Four chapters a week.
Days: Monday, Wednesday, Thursday, Saturday.
Chapter length: 3500-5000 words per chapter.

Original - World of Dungeons

When Suzuraki Town is threaten and all seems lost, an elite organization known as the White Horns deploy a special forces group to combat the demons. Join Takuya Kono and Souta Kazuya as they try to find out why the number of demons have increased while at the same time, try to figure out who the new players are.

Title: Dystopius
Synopsis:
In the opulent Imperial Capital city, The people live in peace and harmony. The shops are full, the decorations glitter, trade and riches hanging low upon the tree for any common man or woman to simply reach up and grasp some of the riches for themselves. Freedom, peace, prosperity and joy, all created by the hard labor and love of the exalted bloodline of the Imperial Emperors. Where death comes late and only due to gluttony or old age... The justice is overseen by the Imperial City's ever vigilant guard force, of impeccable morals, generosity and they too handing out Imperial love in quantity.
Is how it is above ground.
Deep beneath the Imperial City is carved the Imperial Sewers out of the bedrock. Here, life is cheap and ruined dreams and violence intermingle among the filth and utter squalor. One of those living there, carving out a meagre existence by theft and murder, is a young girl...
 
(Useful info time! The releases for this one will largely follow the same pattern as the main project Avine. One chapter every friday for foreseeable future).
 09.29.18: Reality caught up with me, this means I have to scale back my writing time considerably. I promise to finish it, but it will be piecemeal, and progress made likely around holiday times.

Title: Darkazania
Synopsis: In the present time, There was a boy who grew alone, without a family or friends, but hopefully he didn't give up on life, but because he loved some fake person he died protecting the same person who broke his heart, at the result of dying young he found out he was transferred into an other world.

Title: Just a zombie trying to survive
Synopsis:
One day it all happened.
Zombies,monsters,and mythological creatures were summoned into the world by a mysterious force as part of a game.
I didnt even know what was going on i was just happily using my trust righty and my door was broken into by my friends dog who bit me. This started my life as a crazy/ harem chasing zombie.

Title: June
Synopsis: She moves to New York. Makes a friend. Prepares to open a cafe, with her best friend, Rachel. Where is Rachel though?

Title: Well of Fortune
Synopsis:
Anarchy, famine and plague continue to run rampant on the continent of Atros. Villages and small towns are wiped out as cities are hastily fortified. Royal lineages are smothered as new imperial legacies begin to fester in the cracks of these dark ages. At the root of this chaos is foreign powers forcefully opening the continent isolated from the rest of the world for well over a millenia. The inhabitants of Atros are left unprepared in adapting to a world centuries ahead in technology, political and societal administration, warfare, and the lost arts of Exun. the essence of the gods.
Amus is one of the many refugees left displaced by the conflict and tragedy of these dark ages. Starving in city slums with the other youth he is one day fortunate enough to be given a glimpse of what is possible.

Title: The forgotten path
Synopsis:
The world isn’t what it seem
They say that for every smoke there is a fire a lot of legend have been mention all over the wold is it real or just myth a fragment of suck mind of an ignorant men or there is more in the world.
Or do you even know the world

Title: Demon Lord try to be Human
Synopsis: A universe were The Childern of the Gods and The Spawns of the Exist fight a none ending war. A once human Undead Demon Lord was defeated by a Hero. While dying he trick the hero so it can regain a new life. In his new life he learn that humans lost the knowledge of his most favorite thing Manga. He follow his dream to bring back Manga to the humans.

Title: Isekai Dudes On The Run
Synopsis:
Something I'm writing for the selfish purpose of training my English, please help: writing skill lv1.
The story:
Three dudes are transported to another world, yadagadabadaya... However, they don't desire this new fantasy life and will look for a way back.
“Unfortunately destiny loves to screw up"

Title: Sea of Chaos; A VRMMORPG Novel
Synopsis:
Welcome to Sea of Chaos, a VR game the likes of which has never been seen. Large swaths of the world are constantly in flux, shifting from a giant sea one day, to a blistering jungle the next. The only unchanging lands those held by the City States, or wealthy individuals able to afford the ludicrously expensive Anchors that keep the land stable. Monsters constantly plague the world in an endless swarm of mutating madness, held back only by powerful warriors, thick walls, steam power, and ancient magics. Follow Nathan Bright as he leads his FUN-loving Clan as they scheme and plot, battling monsters, players, and politicians to gain control over the bountiful and ever-dangerous lands in the giant world of the Sea of Chaos. 
Warning: Includes questionable morals, extreme violence, sexual content, torture, slavery, and all sorts of nasty bits. Oh, and a few stabs at humour, and the occasional reference, but those can be ignored. ( Especially the references, lest certain groups catch wind that a random internet author is writing fiction making a mockery of their works. )

Title: The Orator
Synopsis:
General Talos led the rebellion against the Gaian Commonwealth. Many years of hardship and toil led to Talos' victory. By doing so, citizens obtained the freedom to achieve in the arts and sciences once more. With the AI's purged, human society could advance whereas before the world had stagnated. He will seize power for the masses because he had been called by the Orator. Leading was his sign of devotion. By the year 255, the plans will set in motion. All I have left to do is pray.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The colony had overstepped the line a final time. Gaia was guilty of tax evasion, banned technology, and destruction of Earth property. I called the President to fill him in on the details. The disaster of 2111 was not to be repeated. Otherwise, the re-election of the United Earth Confederacy would not run smoothly for Rhea Aionios. As all politicians know, war improves approval ratings. An opportunity like this could set Rhea up as a legend. I just needed to be on her side to enjoy the benefits.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Baethan no longer holds his head high after the War. I had killed my friends in the heat of battle and watched their heads fall with a terror-stricken face. I earned his stripes for money, while he stripped himself of his humanity. I had run out of his sleep medicine and would have to make the trip downtown. Maybe I could get some crepes at the bakery as well. I heard a new row of shops had opened up near my Aunt's old place. I enjoy the bobbles those vendors sell.

Title: God, he messed up
Synopsis: God messed up.He messes up quite frequently but they are small problems. But this time, he messed up big. He sent a powerful soul into a different place than where it was supposed to go.Trying to redeem himself he finds this soul on the edge of life and death, and brings him back with a few cheat like powers. In his true world, one on comic books, the hunter x hunter world

Title: [ABANDONED] ENTROPY REVERSION ERROR
Synopsis:
Story Tropes: New World / (Mass) Summoned / LitRPG
Main Character: Joe
OP Level: Mid tier and not the strongest by a large margin
Why write story around Joe if he's not gonna be OP OP?: His journey to strength is different? It's fun to write? I want to? Joe is badass.
Is there a general direction you are taking the story?: I'm just writing for fun. I know how I want the story to start and what I want Joe to encounter in his adventures. I have no idea how he is going to cope with all the shit I throw his way though.

Title: The vengeful invoker
Synopsis:
What will you be able to do for revenge?
"I want power, the power to destroy all my enemies!" shouted Law
"HAHAHAHA kid you truly are interesting but give you power just like that won't be funny, everything has a price you know?"
"I don't care"
"Well said!"
This is a story of vengeance.
 a story of how I became the troublemaker that the bored Goddess was looking for.
This is a story of a normal kid who suddenly became the Magus who would throw the world upside-down.
The most powerful invoker!

Title: The Mechanical Epoch
Synopsis:
Ether, a mysterious, near-magical phenomena, a spontaneous stain that had spread through galactic spacetime for the past five hundred years. It had given birth to a burgeoning humanity, allowing for the creation of warp gates and FTL engines, sending humans to colonize the far reaches of the galaxy. It was the foundation of the strength of ether mages, ether meisters, and warlocks who would harness its powers to create miracle after miracle.
And yet, five hundred years after its appearance, it would be cause for humanity's bitter end. An unknown 'disease' had spread over its foundations, driving sentient beings to madness, mutating the ether-gifted wielders of magics into swollen monstrosities of flesh, polluting the very space around them with more disease, and corrupting the innocents into feral, ghoulish, cannibalistic aberrations.

But none of this was the immediate concern of Jun, a combat droid in the galactic rim, awakening to sentience among the raging flames of the battlefield.

Title: Crisis Zero
Synopsis:
Crisis Zero, an event that forever changed the world. In this story, follow the adventures of a boy and his sister who lost their mother during this incident... Unlike a typical adventure themed story, this story tends to dwell into a more comedic and romantic side that I hope everyone can enjoy :)
Story revisits the lives of heroic spirits of the past whether it be fictional or real, inspired by the fate series :)
Cover isn't my image, credits to the owner https://www.pinterest.com/pin/505529126903206511/

Title: Adventures of Eva the wicked.
Synopsis:
Although a criminal John never got enough thrills in his life, circumastances of his death slightly annoying to the man. Getting another chance to start over hes more than thrilled, though some things have changed John is still John even if not exactly the same.
Just a warning my grammars not all great and the chapters are gonna be kinda long if that dosn't bother you come enjoy reading!
 
Will be posting 1-2 chapters a week maybe 3 if im not too busy.

Title: Operation: Side Character
Synopsis:
I was summoned into another world as John. At first, I thought I was in a typical Isekai or Xuanhuan or Xianxia, summoned or reincarnated, to overturn the system or the heavens.
But noooooo!
Apparently, my seatmate in class is called Jiang Longwei, who happens to be the Son of a Powerful Noble Clan but was found to be a cripple so he was disowned, his fiancee broke her engagement with him, he was betrayed by all his 'friends' and now he wants to seek revenge. Oh, he also has a weird pendant on his neck and would sometimes talk to himself.
Anyway, this is the story of me being in his Xianxia/Isekai story doing Side Character things.

Title: Not So Fictional Me
Synopsis:
Alex, a below average teenager. With no dreams to fulfill and no magical or supernatural incident to suddenly teleport him to a more exciting world, he was stuck with his utterly normal life. 
A life where he spent most of his time with his computer, mobile and consoles. But is this what life is all about? Indulging yourself with videogames, tv, fantasy novels and imagination? Something inside him was making him numb, bit by bit, everyday. Will he able to wake up from his modern nightmare and connect to reality again? Or is it too late? 
Follow his story as he battles puberty, unusual sexual urges, awkwardness, various addictions and low IQ to become the greatest warrior in human history and defeat the great devourer... Ahm, Become a functional member of the society.

Title: Universe: Onset
Synopsis: Universe: Onset is the story of Derek - A highschool graduate that doesn't have any goals in life other than working a dead-end job. On the last day of school a new and very promising game by the name of Universe: Onset is released. Upon logging in, Derek discovers that he might be able to make a living and a life in this game, but that might require some serious dedication to the game.

Title: Looking through the window
Synopsis:
Another person got cought by unfortunate chain of disasters or maybe not... What if disasters go with person? Is fate real or people struggle from something beyond them? What is the fate? What is imagination?
 
Story will be changed by time. Sorry bunny no lies. It can evolve  into something entirely else. Do you read any books about universe, about anything in what we trust? What do you seek? Are you blind and always do what someone is telling you? Your last wish what will it be? Being the pupet is good? Are this world realllyyyyy real from actual science point of view? Maybe we live in someone else dream in some parralel universe?
 
Sorry my grammar is veeerrryyy bad...

Title: Stopwatch
Synopsis:
I made the decision to live a normal life instead of the life of a protector. I never felt the need for power and just wanted to do normal things, like having a drink after a hard day of work. I was chosen for something I didn’t want to be and I didn’t want to be my father’s puppet.
In the search for power, he created a monster he couldn’t control. Maybe with this second chance, I can stop this monster and his creators.

Title: Soul Magician
Synopsis: The Gods Rebelled, the Devils turned traitors and the demons invaded. The Tri-dimension was thrown into chaos as a massive war was held between the heavens and hells. Humans who were oblivious to magic and chaos were tempted by the demons. Brian a scientist after his death is thrown into a world of magic and death. Follow him as he finds his destiny by walking a path of knowledge, horror and massacre.

Title: "Because I am Tianzi Daiyu!"
Synopsis:

yes, he is op

Title: Dragon god
