she basically becomes a god.
first time writing a story

Title: Reincarnation
Synopsis: It's my first time writing. A eccentric girl that wants to find her purpose in life. Reborn without knowing her purpose to live. She finds things odd for her not to remember much but about the race she's been made into and the world she's going to now live in. She's in a strange world that doesn't have common sense from Earth.

Title: Parasites and Magic
Synopsis:
A creature that feeds on magical energy to evolve and reproduce can't be all that bad...right?
Spoiler: 



 Cover Art by ngt

Title: Gate keeper
Synopsis:
The story starts out with a young girl who is condemned and has to guard the Gate. By the gods order she and many others before their last breath were put to work as guards for these forbidden gate worlds. Can she escape to live her life or will she forget even how her face looks like? The masks given to them are to make sure no one recognizes them. Yet they are also forgetting who they even are except their names and crime.
Can they remember their memories? Their pasts? Or can they escape their fate of being guards for the rest of their lives?

Title: Hail the King
Synopsis:
When the common folk hear of the Hell King, they think of many different things"It is the king of monsters!" "A calamity unfolded that knows nothing but destruction" "The true pinnacle of hatred and wrath." "A savage demon that eats children" "It's no doubt the king of despair as well as every child's bed monster."
However, when you ask those scholars of ages long past, they will answer "It is one of the many riddles of life, one that no man has yet solved." "It is a great question, one so great that you shouldn't ask." "I honestly don't know." "Truly child? Since youth have I dreamed of meeting it, and you expect me to fullfill such a task in my lifetime?" "Nobody truly has any evidence it is evil, yet at the mere mention of the name I tremble in fear."
One thing is for sure. Nobody truly knows who said Hell King really is. Not the greatest of cultivators, the grandest of swordsmen nor the wisest of sages.
Nobody even knows where the stories of the Hell King come from, and yet everybody knows them.
This is a story about a broken man, a man cursed by the heavens, an enigma to the whole world, a ruler of a dead kingdom and a monster born out of despair. "I wish not for women, I wish not for gold nor do I wish for happiness. All I wish for is to be granted eternal rest."

Title: Sky Walkers
Synopsis:
The planet of ethos is unlike any other mankind has ever seen after many million years the quality of earth's environment posed a threat to life. in pursuit of chance to live and thrive humans found a planet many light years in the event of this atronomical exodus the population declined morethan half. After living on ethos for a thousand years they were able to unlock half of its secrets. But after some time scientists found that the core  of ethos is expanding rapidly which may lead to its destruction. with the knowledge attained through these millions of years the best team of scientists gathered and found a way to save the planet. most of the terrain of planet stands in the sky above the ground due to the planet's anamolous gravitational properties. After surviving this threat a new supernatural power suddenly emerges within the masses. It's called the Mist. When people use this power water in their body emerges as sweat and turns into mist. These people with supernatural people are called as Naturals. The Mist appears frequently in five colours, but some individuals attain rare colour mist which signifies the uniqueness of their power. Our Protagonist is a National Athlete who is a seeded player. 
He is a normal guy who attains a Unique Mist because of a certain incident. His attention turns slowly towards the international official sport of Naturals - Fall. This story is about how he rises to the top and saves ethos from a dangerous threat.

Title: Your Secret's Safe With Me (I Think...)
Synopsis: Ricky Castillo is a living the typical high school life. He keeps up with his homework, deal with his annoying siblings, surfs the net for games and anime, gets dragged around by his best pal and makes sure he's out of the radar of the popular kids' tyranny. But this all changes when a half-Japanese-half-Filipino girl named Amy Kawaii transfers into his class. After a "slight" mishap in gym class, he overhears something about the new transfer student that arouses his suspicions and soon discovers that she's the famous pop idol "Mayph" who suddenly vanished from the spotlight two years back. In a hilarious twist, he has to protect this girl's secret from leaking out or else he might deal with more than just threats from her bodyguard. Amy, on the other hand, discovers something about this boy that might bring back her reason for wanting to be an idol in the first place.

Title: Draconia
Synopsis:
This story will bring you to the mysterious continent of Draconia where monsters run rampant.
 Join our heroes in the search for Draconians, the strongest humanoid race that has ever lived while discovering the truth behind their disappearance.

Title: Unmei no Gia
Synopsis:
No matter how long I run, I can never escape my sins
No matter how long time pass by, it will never disappear
No matter how I try to erase it in my mind, I can never do so
 
Takahisa Risu is an ordinary girl at least that's what she wants to be but having no friends and being a loner, she is far from being normal adding to that is her mysterious dreams that she knows nothing about. 
Being burden by something she doesn't know, her life is already hard to live by as it is. Try throwing in a mysterious hot guy into it and her life turns into a roller coaster. But meeting him might turn out to be the key to the questions she seek.

Title: Hell Fighters
Synopsis: Yamato Makida is an underground MMA fighter working towards helping his wife Junko Makida get clean after years of drug use. But not all things turn out as they should. After descending into hell, Yamato finds himself taking part in a fight, but this one can mean easy living or an enternity of damnation.

Title: The Frozen Child
Synopsis: A short story about the tragic death of an unlucky child.

Title: The Legends of Col: Red Tide
Synopsis: The lives of three high school students take a turn for the worse when they are sucked into another world, a world where a king reigns supreme with the help of the superhuman forces he controls. The worst part is, a radical resistance group known as The Red Tide is convinced that the high school students were sent there by God to help put an end to the king’s reign.

Title: Void Infinity!
Synopsis: ~~ even though this is a fanfiction, and because someone said so: The cover I used for this story is an image from the anime "Full Metal Alchemist". When I get the inspiration (im really bad at drawing) I'll try to create my own cover...so... a truck killed me and now I'm a "hero" for the God of nothingness, waiting for the battle royale that the primordial gods are making....using the "Terror Infinity System" I'll be getting stronger to enter to the battle....well... not that I want to....

Title: Paragons of the Collective
Synopsis: In the future, humanity lives within the Collective as they expand their dominance throughout the known universe. Technology has advanced to the point where it operates like the magic of ancient history and species throughout the universe look similar to the monsters that have plagued the human imagination for centuries. All of this is immaterial for John, a young man with an F-ranked Avatar stuck in a system designed to keep him in the dregs of society. In a society where advancement depends upon Contribution Points and those without points are forced to toil in labor for those that do. Follow John in his journey to collect enough Contribution Points to firmly entrench his place in the galaxy as a Paragon of the Collective.

Title: The Ties That Bind
Synopsis:
Suddenly awakened In the hot sticky wastes of the Arizona desert walks a being born of impossiblity given form. Beyond explanation or reason, A grandeoise being of primordial and everlasting existance, the vessel of the original state of balance that serparated into Light and Darkness. meet Tikan. A fun loving and sarcastic creature of unimaginable origin, trying to find two halves of themself that are hidden in everything. it's like finding a godly needle in an infantismal haystack. But there's a universal countdown. And lingering in the backround the fabric of reality is begining to fade at the hands of a self proclaimed "Neo Godhead", and the creeping hands of the end poison the air. all things seem to be leading to a peak, and all that ever was in this world is soon to rend itself apart. Something is coming. And the one and only person that can fix a collapse bigger than the beginning itself, can't even seem to decide what they want for breakfast off a fileberto's menu.  "Here I stand,that which bound and existed.the background of the way before All, and Nothing.im am that which traverses things unexplained before words were born"
These are the Ties That Bind.

Title: Virtuoso
Synopsis: Its my first attempt at creating a novel so all criticism, constructive and critical, is welcomed. Michael, the prtoganist, is an aspiring musician on the verge of creating his magnum opus, and forever being imprinted into the world's history as a musician and composer greater than the masters of legend. However, as he approached the pincalled, fate was cruel, and he was struck down.

Title: The Magic 8 Ball
Synopsis:
Ever read a reincarnation story? Of course you have! What about one involving a magic 8 ball? Probably not.
Despite the lighthearted nature of the summary, this is not a comedy.

Title: In your death shoes
Synopsis:
What would you do if you will recieve a punishment that lets you live the last day of the person that is about to die? Would you run away?  would you accept your fate? or would you go crazy and do everything you want in that someone else's body?
 
This is my first novel. Please give me advices and feedbacks, I will gladly read them all.Go easy on me. haha
 
If you like my stories please donate. Koala needs his beer :).

Title: The High & Mighty
Synopsis: All men are not equal. This was revealed to humanity by Trufloxin, the miracle drug said to unlock one's true potential. Taking this drug would briefly awaken a person's hidden power, but some powers are far more advantageous than others. Some, in fact, proved dangerous. Thus, regular use of Trufloxin became restricted to those with powers deemed useful by the government.As the gap between the powered users and everyday citizens begins to widen, Zachary Flemming takes his knowledge from Trufloxin's development to cook it in secret, hoping restore equality among man.  Taking to the streets, he will turn the government’s tool into a weapon of resistance, spreading it amongst those most desperate and most willing to fight.And just maybe, he’ll prove that mankind’s potential does not require a drug to unleash.

Title: Boots on New Ground
Synopsis:
A team led by Albert Gallows was sent to complete a simple mission. Locate the production facility of a new weapon of mass destruction and put it on a permanent delay. Unfortunately things didn't go according to plan, an unexpected detonation placed them in an unpredictable situation. Now launched into a realm of swords and magic, they will have adapt to this new place. Boots on the ground soldiers, either survive or fade into the earth of the world, Oldana.
 
Hello everyone! As a longtime lurker of this site I've enjoyed many stories on this site. I figured now would be a better time then any to get cracking and see if I can make something any good. As this is my first story, I would appreciate any advice, criticisms, or aggressive booing. Thank for sharing your time with me and reading this piece of fiction. Hopefully you'll enjoy the ride : )

Title: Instant Action [LitRPG]
Synopsis:
A slow growth LitRPG story featuring two games, SciFi (Millitary Cyberpunk) and Fantasy (New World/Realism), with a heavy focus on group/guild dynamics.
Feedback and suggestions warmly welcomed.
Please be aware that these chapters are a work in progress, subject to editing and revision.
I plan on posting in a relatively finished form, if you guys would rather quicker rougher updates please let me know.

Title: Poems of emotion
Synopsis:
By rl89
This is a bunch of poems that I wrote throughout my life. My experiences and my soul which has broken many times. I have decided to post  these poems which I have wrote. So to the critics on here can #### off if you can not understand a persons feelings then don't read

Title: Savior University
Synopsis: Ishikawa Akira, a young brash teenager, has always dreamt and aspired to be a superhero, just like those fantasy stories he used to watch. Unfortunately, this is an impossible dream with society's current standing. One day, a series of events led to a very tragic incident at the train he rode. What would happen next when he realizes the things society deem as impossible, suddenly stood right in front of him?(Inspired by anime like Boku no Hero Academia and Dungeon ni Deai)

Title: I was reborn in another world with a maxed out speech skill
By any means
Synopsis: New to writing stories, please criticize the story so I can grow as an author. Tired of novels with the main character that has unrealistic powers or some other bs that defies logic? Well don't get your hopes up because this novel will probably be the same, but I will at least try to make it different then your average story. This is the story of a man forced to prove his worth by any means with only 2 options, Fight or die trying.

Title: The Flower Shiro found under the Moonlight
Synopsis:
Just when do you cross the line of like, and cross over to the line of love?
How much should you like someone before you can confidently say you love someone?
Does this "love" break easily?
Or does this "love" stand strong?
This story is about Shiro and Hana's fateful meeting and the relationship that follows after.
Both of them with their own problems and secrets that would make or break their relationship depending on how they deal with it together.
***
Chapter release will be irregular, sorry.

Title: Fortress of Black Rock
Synopsis:
In the nine realms,on the highest realm, there exists a black fortress.
Nobody knows from where this fortress came with its mysterious outside made from black rock.
Nor how long it has been in that same place all that they know is that it is unpenetrable.

Title: Starlight Road II
Synopsis: College shut-in Thomas signed up for Starlight Road II Beta without reading the contract. Now 'voluntarily' stuck in the game, he woke up as Ray, or better known as Mr. Tragedy. How will he hide his true identity without knowing much about Ray? Will his experience in Starlight Road I and bug-like high INT stat be adequate to keep him alive?

Title: RE:interference
Synopsis:
Got hit by a truck now i get 20 wishes............ super op mc                                                                                                                                                                                                Jin kurasagi is a normal half Japanese and half American that is a super otuko and gamer that can keep good grades in school also he keeps his body helthey and manges his time pefectly so he can watch and play the latesest shows,games
 
Edit

Title: Apocalyptic Earth Game
Synopsis:
Tristan was a 15 year old boy who could knock the socks off a full grown man.  He was strong from his rough and tumble childhood with Peter, his elder brother.
He kept to himself mostly, except for the girl Kirsten, who took a liking to him.
One day, he is forced to make a hard decision, and he makes the only decision he feels he can make.  
Recca 6 was coming out, he was going to buy one of the VR headgear's for Kirsten.  They would play the game Apocalypse Earth together.  
But that asshole split them up.  And he made Tristan become the bad guy.
6 months later, Tristan puts on the Recca 6 and enters Apocalypse Earth, a game world 27000 years in the future.  He unknowingly dons the North King's Mask.  
His desire is to be next to Kirsten without her knowing.  His desire is for the girl he loves to be with him.  
What starts out as a simple journey becomes a life of change.  
Follow Tristan, and Sundome, Tristan's game name on their adventures!!

Title: One Above All
Synopsis:
William Bay was just your average young adult with no clear plans for the future after finishing his studies. Although he had no clear picture of what he wished to do, he loved indulging in his hobbies including martial arts and martial art literature. Although it was only a hobby, William took it seriously and showed interest in multiple different paths of the arts.
However one day his life came to a sudden stop, painlessly, and with no warning signs. However just as one path closed on him, another one had made itself known to him. Willaim found himself reincarnated into another world; World of Cultivation.
World of Cultivation was a world filled with heroes and beauties. But William was no hero...but a beauty. William who was incarnated into the world of his passion wouldn't let anyone or anything stand in his way to reach his goal: To stand above all else.
Little over thirteen years have passed since her rebirth, after reaching maturity she was finally given her first cultivation manual. As she picked up the manual and cultivated according to books pages, she discovered something. Turns out that her body was equipped with an amazing ability.
Blessed with an incredible hidden cheat, she would dominate the world.
//Do not be discouraged by the Gender Bender tag. It ultimately matters very, very little in the end and is mostly played for a bit of comedy later in the story as well as explaining her ultra-tomboy behavior. There will be some interesting romance...later...//
//Do not be discouraged by the Sexual Content warning. It is there as a precaution and I will explicitly state when there are super raunchy scenes. Those as well are gonna be...later...//

Title: Symbolism of Life Vol. 1
Synopsis: I'm just a 16 year old kid who wants to write about symbolism that I see in everyday life.

Title: Veracity: A Tale of Seven Sins
Synopsis:
Larceny is a crime, but that never really stopped anybody in Soccordia. When Rhys' endevors begin to draw attention from the wrong kind of people, he is eventually coerced into pulling off a heist on nothing less than the King's own treasury - simply as a test to gauge his qualifications.
When the gears begin to turn and Rhys' real target takes him across Continents, to other Kingdoms the size of the world amazes him. For a boy who has never ventured outside of his own city, Rhys is thrust into the throes of magic, the might of knights and a story that is not his own - a story of Rulers.
P.S: The cover actually gives some really different vibes as compared to what the actual story is going be about. Please do not be put off by it :p

Title: The 73'th
Synopsis:
When a man who uses his eloquent tounge and his smarts to advance into the foundations of society is summoned into a world of monsters and magic as the 'Hero', he is forced to fight against the bane of all living things, the 'Eater of Souls'.
After getting completely overpowered by his enemy he gets killed, and just when he thought his eternal sleep was finally at hand he is reincarnated into a new world as a demon lord.
This is the story of the 73'th, and weakest of the demon lords, the one-horned demon, Azazel.

Title: Heavenly Darkness
Synopsis:
The world of Heavenly Darkness is governed by the Great Balance and the gods that protect that balance have developed the Divine Karma System to ensure that all creatures have a chance to improve their lot in life. Over the years, numerous wars have been fought between the forces of the Heavenly and Infernal realms, with wins and losses on both sides. One hundred years ago, the fourth and most recent War of Heavenly Darkness had been fought, with the infernal forces having been the clear victors. Society has begun to rebuild as it always had after such wars and with the power vacuum caused by the massive death toll, opportunities to better oneself are everywhere.
Wolrig, is an orphan in the small village of Mountain view. The village has little use for orphans, so Wolrig was only given the most basic of educations. With little to look forward to except a life as a laborer, Wolrig waits for his awakening to occur on his 16th birthday. When it occurs, he learns that his future may not be as bleak as he once thought, because he awakened with a unique tier class. Now with renewed hope, Wolrig will have to pull himself out of the gutter he had been thrown into and in so doing show the entire world his true worth.

/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/
Heavenly Darkness is a massive world that has an greaat deal of back story. I have used this setting for over 25 years in many table top games and I am glad to have found a new outlet to explore my world in.
 
This story will be a typical LITRPG for the first 36 chapters, when it will become heavily focused on Kingdom Building. I hope you all enjoy this story as I begin to put it together.

Title: Set Ablaze
Synopsis:
On vacation until mid-August.

In the times of the Forefathers, when wars were waged, villages were pillaged and innocents were murdered, the lost souls fought against the injustice that befell them. Only after the continuous pleading for a new chance, the Gods decided to be lenient: They gifted them one opportunity. One pathway to lead them to the life they were once robbed. 
Those, whose desire to get back to the living was strong enough could recover a part of their soul, turning them to beings between the living and the dead. Beings with the embers of a new life inside of them. Beings whose eventual purpose will turn into solely trying reclaiming their past.
With rekindling their souls, they earn the right to venture out of the ever sleeping lands of the dead, stepping a foot into the Lost Kingdom, where they try to climb the Tower of Gods.
 

 
I am still figuring out as to what direction the story should take, as this story is something I spontaneously decided to start writing. That could result in the story not being as refined as I (or the potential readers) want it to be.

Ryley Allard isn’t a demon, and everyone in the Demon World knows it. What they don’t know is that he understands next to nothing about how a criminal justice system actually works. A detective? A lawyer? A law expert? If it means getting to keep his head attached to his body, he’ll be whatever he has to be… Even if that means he has to create the demon law system from the ground up, one mystery at a time.

Title: The Dungeon Masquerade
Synopsis:
The planning I put into my life went to waste. I enrolled in officer school, joined the military. After I served my time, I planned to leave, take my government land, and settle with a cute girl somewhere. That was the plan. However, my fellow knights and I went to clear out a dungeon, as is our duty. To pay a life or two was an expected cost, but the deaths of everyone was not. Everyone died. Except for me.
I had alone survived and the dungeon became my prison, my home. The planning I put into my life went to waste, but that did not mean I could'nt start over. So, from the depths of the dungeon, that is what I did: carve out my new life as a dungeon.

If he can't then his life will be jeopardize as the MC won't be able to get a job and he doesn't have any other options due to him being statless. Can the nameless MC somehow produce a miracle in being able to accomplish the impossible and be on par with his peers at school?
*Note: I'm very new at writing and would be happy if people would point out what needs to be done to improve my story and I will try to at least post 1 chapter each week. I will also update/modify the story's tags if anything changes as the chapters go on. 
Soul image is found in this website https://www.circleofhope.net/blog/what-do-you-think-about-the-soul/ and the word status is a snapshot of an image found in this website https://www.shutterstock.com/search/status?searchterm=status&page=2

Also, what is with this tiny cave? What is with this....pool? Lake? Either way, somehow I need to find a way to survive, which should be easy right? There's nothing around anyway, what could go wrong? 
Oh wait, I remember now. If memory serves this strange formation was called, in my previous life,..... a Blue Hole.

Benny doesn't know its significance until after a series of events where he is transported to Mundo Magica, a parallel world of Adventurers and Magic. There he meets Tenryu Fyreroar, an Adventurer with a penchant of setting things on fire with his Fire Magic and Swordsmage Skills, whom he seems to share a strange connection. Title: Blaze
Synopsis:
The story of a fire elemental's life in a world dominated by mages. He will have to learn how to manage betrayals, treachery, and maybe even love as he goes on adventures to find a meaning to it all. From dark, humble beginnings he will rise... or fall, devastating amounts in his journey across the world.

Hello, Author here! I am, unfortunately, rather terrible at coming up with descriptions that seem to have the right amount of decorum and yet actually serve their function of adequately describing the story, so here's the coursenotes.
- The story follows a fire elemental. (As you can tell from that, it is heavily besed on fantasy with mages and the like. Technology will not feature prominently)
-As mentioned in the tags, this will have game-like aspects. (E.G. levels, stats. I will be trying to put my own twist on this notion however, so bear with me if the premise intrests you but you despise LitRpg)
-It'll get rather dark, but not devastatingly so. (I'm trying to write a more complex story so it will have its dark moments, the prologue being one of them. Rest assured the whole story will not be this dark, though I'll make sure that no-one is a saint either)
-The protagonist/protagonists will not be a Mary-Sue. (The plural will be understood when I'm further into the story. They also won't be impossiby unlikeable such as those in many Light novels.)
-There is no prophecy (Anyone who says there is, is lying, trust me.)

Can Darenzo survive and thrive in this changed world? Or will his growing madness best him? The answers to these questions can only be revealed with time.

Here Eric was given a mission by the old man who appeared before him, he was sent to countless worlds suffering countless tragedies. He experience multiple lives and learned a lot of things, but... even with this he is still unable to break free.
A hundred years have passed and Eric was now a broken dark soul, the old man who made him go through hell called himself god, after making Eric suffer he freed him.
Feeling happy of being freed Eric was ecstatic at having to be able to rest but as he was going to be revived a message popped up in his head.
<<Vincentius has placed a curse on you, "The Curse of Tragedy">>
With anger consuming his soul Eric promised to himself and to the dark void that he would kill the god who made him suffer, he would erase Vincentius from existence and with those thoughts his mind faded into darkness.

Title: Something Different. (Title Not Officially decided on.)
Synopsis:
Decided to attempt to write another story. This one is a bit different than what I normally write. 
This is mysterius novel where you won't know anything about the character. You have to guess. You make your own assumptions your own theories. I won't tell you about the protagonist. I won't tell you his history. I won't tell you much of anything. You will have to figure out from the story. From the chapters. What this is about.

Title: Avoid Destiny
Synopsis:
Summary 1
 
Destiny
Noun. the hidden power believed to control what will happen in the future; fate.
 
I never believed in such things.
 
People use destiny as an excuse to push responsibility onto a hero. There is no predetermined hero, just someone who happened to be in the right place, at the right time. 
 
Ironic as it may be, I was the person who happened to be in the right place, at the right time. But there is one last thing that completes destiny, and that’s the action a hero takes to change the future.
 
I’ve already completed steps 1 and 2 in the process of fate without my knowledge, so I might as well use the 3rd step to my advantage. 
 
This is the story of changing the future to avoid destiny. 
 
 
Summary 2
 
Do you want to change the world?
 
The fate of the future was forever changed by this question. Three childhood friends took on this daunting task and accomplished something unimaginable. Sacrifices were made and blood was spilled, at the cost of prosperity and peace.Teleported to a fantasy world where magic is possible, these 3 individual set out to make this new world a better place.

Title: Four times I've died, the fifth was intentional
Synopsis:
Life came with many a number of terrible decisions and most assuredly, unnecessary and mistaken ideals. My birth was one of them, most unfortunately. Mother was brought up in an educated, but protected environment as she drank her mother’s own milk and ate under her father’s roof with the belief true love prevailed.
Anyway, Mary was her name and it stood for ‘love’ and ‘beloved’. But I grew up knowing the sides of ‘sea of bitterness’ and ‘rebelliousness’ that carved themselves on one side of the same coin to her name. This would first be a short story of Mary, before she had me; before and after she met my father, one I’ll never love.
It will be the first chapter to my story. The cherished origin of my first life in five.

Title: A Not Quite Parallel World Story
Synopsis:
Have you heard of ‘Alternate Realities’? Of course you have, even kindergartners would easily be able to grasp the principles behind such basic concepts.
Thus, there begins my story; the story of a man who had found himself in a world that could only be described as the fabled ‘Alternate Reality'. In my previous world, due to a spiral of unfortunate events- some of which were admittedly of my own creation- I tragically met my end. By the time I had somehow regained consciousness, I found myself inhabiting the body of a foreign eight-year-old girl with all the memories of my previous life intact.
This world, which I have since dubbed ‘Timeline B’, has some very noticeable… ‘problematic’ differences from the world I had been familiar with. The level of technology and culture hadn’t deviated from the old world. That said, the structure of society had an awkwardly meshed in ‘Nobility’ system in an otherwise perfectly functional democratic government. Not only that, but people I knew from my previous life also existed in this world, heck, my previous incarnation had also existed in this world until that version died as well.
Just what is this world?

Synopsis:

Our Main character seeks truth and in that journey, for truth, he sees the world for what it truly is and rebels against it. join him on a journey of truth, revenge, and immortality! 
I encourage everyone to leave comments and reviews. It will help me in developing and refining the story.The number of words vary between each chaper. Title: The Gurdians of Smoke
Synopsis: The Guardians of Smoke was the most sought after position, the position itself was being the personal guard to a God or Goddess. Every God or Goddess gets one guardian until that guardian dies, the God or Goddess can not change or trade their guardian but guardian's not bearing their God or Goddess mark can be requested by other Gods or Goddesses with permission of the guardian's deity. In reality this wasn't a common situation since a guardian without a mark means that they have been rejected by their deity and are worthless.

Title: Re:Awaken
Synopsis: Takagi, a male which found nothing but boredom and harboured hatred towards his mundane life suddenly found himself when he went to sleep to be in an entire new and exciting world. Here Takagi’s own tale could unravel and start anew as he would venture on to explore what this world had to offer without the limitations of his old one. Adventurers awaited, quests yet to be taken, monsters to be sighted and slain, and if all goes well, a possible hero by name, and maybe more at night, if he could just find a companion or more to spend his adventuring nights with.

Title: Perception
Synopsis: A team of people with superhuman sensory enhancements are used by the governemt for high stakes law enforcement, paramilitary action, and other tasks suited to their abilities. This story is told from the perspective of one of these people, called "Stink" by their peers, but designated officially with the serial number O-67. They are a misanthropic outcast among outcasts, who must navigate the dynamics of their team, world events related to these superhumans, and their interpersonal relationships.

Title: The Theory of Science
Synopsis: Science is the answer to everything. But what happens when science becomes a resource that everyone fights over for?

Title: Demon of the Darkest Night
Synopsis:
When Mason Nevels is dragged into The Trials, his only priority is finding the means to survive. A single message tells him that he must find the power to ensure humanity's survival before they appear in this isolated plane in several months, and an unknown force equips him with a dangerous artifact capable of making Mason into something more than human: the Staff of Mardun.
The Trials are unforgiving. They pit the best and worst of races from across the universe in a magical battle for superiority, ever-fueled by increasingly scarce resources in a land that can transform in the blink of an eye. But for Mason, a single drop of mana is enough to burn his body from within, and the cost of relying on the abilities of the Staff of Mardun may be the very humanity he's tasked to defend.
In order to forge the strength and alliances necessary to survive the dangers of the The Trials, Mason must balance a growing need for power with the strength of character to retain his identity. 
Please Rate this story five stars if you enjoy it! I promise rewards in the form of more content.
Welcome to The Trials.

Title: I Want to be Free!
Synopsis: Usually, the prologue of cliché transported to otherworld story is———• Protagonist wakes up in unfamiliar place and is greeted by pretty goddess with refreshing smile.• The Goddess tells protagonist about the villain, usually demon lord or evil dragon, and how she needs protagonist's help to slay the villain.• Protagonist gets Over-Powered ability from the goddess.• Goddess sends off the protagonist with motivational speech or sometimes, a promise any protagonist's wish can be fulfilled after protagonist's mission completed.When that happens to me, however, what I get is———• Being awoken rudely by a goddess...• Being enslaved by a goddess...• Given absurd mission to slay unknown God...• Being threatened before kicked out to the another world...Such was my unfortunate life. This is a story about my new life in other world while trying to get back my freedom...

In order to prepare for a fight against a hero league, [Cerberus], the organization hosting all sorts of villains, decides to artificially create a life form capable of single-handedly destroying all of their enemies.

Title: Small Chests Are Fine Too
Synopsis:
It is an undeniable fact that good things come in small packages. More often than not, it is necessary to trim the fat in order to bring what really matters to the forefront. Having extra bulk may seem like a good idea, but in reality it is merely a crutch that will one day become a hindrance, as it is no substitute for personality nor ability. Indeed, often times it is the small things in life that brighten up our daily lives and constantly remind us exactly why we do the things we do.
However, it is important to keep an open mind, for while bigger is not always better, there are also times when it is. This holds especially true when it comes to hopes and dreams, which have been known to require a suitably large container from time to time. And while dreaming big could potentially lead to massive dissapointment, one will never truly reach fulfilment if they think too small.
A truth that one small woman with meager aspirations is about to find out.
DISCLAIMER: This is a spin-off/side story of my main series, Everybody Loves Large Chests, which is also mandatory reading to understand this one. It runs parallel to the main plot, branching off from the chapter titled Upheaval 2, so there will be spoilers for anyone who hasn't reached that point.

Title: Skyfire: Shinobi Chronicles

General 
Centuries have passed since the Fourth Shinobi World War changed the political sphere of all the World. What was once a strong Alliance between the various secret villages is at this point only a facade, a mirage from the past.
Many great clans want to resume living with by what they call the glorious ways of the past, where ninjas were respected as mighty and terrifying warriors and not dull and peace-loving contract workers.  
Finally, a few weeks before the 4rth centenary anniversary from the end of the war a world-shaking event occurred: Taki, a small secret village placed in the Cascade Country, was invaded by the Tao clan, a major family of the secret village of the Sound. 
The facade has now fallen.
The time of peace is over.

MC?

Title: Watashi wa eiyū ni naritaku ja nai! (I don't want to become a hero)
Synopsis:
What if a single person could change the world?
Some people have just more potential than others, it seems. But to which do we owe this fact? Morbus Fortis, the Protagonist Syndrome, offers an explanation: It's genetics. Some people are simply born smarter, stronger and better-looking than others, but if that makes them any happier remains to be seen. Watashi wa eiy? ni naritaku ja nai explores the daily life of people who are just a cut above the rest - but choose not to act on what destiny has in stock for them. Being a hero is hard, unrewarding work and sometimes you just want to be like everyone else. Join these reluctant heroes, as they try to be anything but.
This story is partially inspired by "Nope! The Anime" by secondlina, as well as One Punch Man, Sakamoto desu ga?, Gag Manga Biyori, WataMote and various genre-defining works, depending on which focus the chapter takes. Also, sometimes the author will annotate things he finds worth of expanding upon in small footnotes, indicated by an asterisk. He hopes you will find them informative and have fun reading this story.

Title: Don't bow down.
Synopsis:
This story is about a person who lost everything in his childhood , will he regain everything in the end or will he fall to never get his revenge, what will becom of him in this pain filled journey, this is a story aboaut person who bears hatred to the world and his creations.
This is the story I only came up  with today , so I don't know if it will evovle into something in the future or not, if people like it I will continue writing it.
I only wrote short part of it right now.
Also english is not my main language, so there will be some tipos.( Alot I think)

Title: Adventure? Slime? Slimeventure? Yeah, something like that.
Synopsis:
HEY, GUESS WHAT? INDEFINITE HIATUS, MWAHAHAHAHAHAHA!
 
(I'm sorry, please forgive me, I just don't have the motivation to work on the story right now.)
 
An unsuspecting man was killed in a most humiliating way. (You guessed it, this is one of those overdone reincarnation stories with a non-humanoid/human protagonist.) Now he's a slime and he wants to make the best of it. Probably? Most-likely? I mean, there's a non-zero chance.
(I think you might be able to tell from where I took inspiration from.)
 
P.S. This is my first fiction here, so... any criticism or insight would be appreciated. Also, I don't really have a direction for this story yet, so imma just go with the flow here, and thanks for any insight you might provide in the future to an utter novice at writing like me.

Title: Single Creation
Synopsis:
“You created me, a being of far greater capacity than you could have imagined at a price beyond your nightmares. Now you are lost, wandering through a desolate land, searching blindly. Seeking something you yourself are not aware of, a place where a lifetime of memories should be, but instead an empty abyss resides.-”
After I disconnected my finger from the drive it shifted back into its original form and a single thought roared through my mind. ‘What did I do?'

Title: The Hellslinger Chronicles
Synopsis: The Hellslinger Chronicles follows a boy named Seth who has lived in the village his whole life training to be a Soul Keeper, a human with piece of Heaven inside them, granting the ability to use magic to fight the evil. He dreams of leaving the village and exploring the world for adventure determined to prove his worth to his Father and the Cardinals of the village that he is ready to be a Soul Keeper. Little does he know, unknown forces are moving against him and his dreams of being a Soul Keeper seems to be slipping away more and more...

Title: Blaze of the new horizon
Synopsis:
Noah is a 19-year-old college student who shares his every day life with Akagi, a beautiful red-haired girl. This may sound like an enviable life, if not because in reality, Akagi is a kind of spirit that takes Noah's energy to survive.
His day by day seemed to remain unchanged until, during a trip to some ancient ruins, a strange device transports Noah and Akagi to a parallel world where magic and fantastic creatures inhabit, or at least, it seems.
How did Akagi end up as a spirit? What is the reason behind Noah's dream visions? Who is the girl of Noah's visions and what relationship does she have with his past? Why were they transported to another world? Noah will have to face the obstacles that are interposed to him in order to recover his lost past, uncover the unknowns after the appearance of Akagi and find the reason why they were called to another world.

Title: Default Reset
Synopsis:
Description:
The MC was playing online games with his friend when he brought up the disappointment of the unforeseen long hiatus that his favorite light novel has been in right at the climax of the story! The MC sighs saying that it has been three years with no signs of the author picking up his pen to continue the story.  The MC recalls the heroics of the fictitious gaming character when he boldly declared to his friend, “If I was that hero I would be able to defeat you at any game!  Even if you were my friend I would make you cry defeat a thousand times at least!”
Unknowingly that those words would make his friend be playful and changing the MC’s life forever.
How his friend would put it “that MC would have had an ordinary life, but that would have been boring”.
 
“So you were helping the MC have a full happy life of adventure?”
“Gosh no. By the way your character died.”
“Noooo. You are a horrible friend!”
“I don’t believe in having friends, but the MC is an OK guy…”
“I bet the MC would have been happier if he didn’t have you as a friend..”
“Your character died again…”
“What?! You are horrible…”
“You know best that I never know defeat!”
“But you failed… as a character and a friend… you aren’t the MC!”
“Your game character was reset to level one deleting the game data…”
“NOOOO!”

Title: The Golden Monarch
Synopsis:
The Golden Monarch: For countless ages gods and powerful beings have protected the universe. At the fringe of known space a darkness encroaches that threatens to consume all. Which heroes will rise to combat the darkness and stand in the light?
Book 1, Rebels Rising: Artien is born into a village on the border of the beastial Wildlands. Warned by his parents never to enter, he lived within the village and it's rules. When a demon hunting party arrives, he is pushed into the Wildlands to escape. Why was he targeted? Will he be able to go back home?

Title: I was brought in another world as my catgirl avatar.
Synopsis:
A rather cold-hearted lawyer ends up transporting inside the world of his favourite game as his catgirl avatar. This is your typical transmigration story full of shitty romance, dark jokes, violence and some fish. Don't forget the stereotypes though, as they're there all right.
~Side Note~
If you're not into ex-males, now females, in love with boys then just don't read, I hate idiots who go around saying yuri is funny. It's just dumb.

Title: Nameless (Dropped)
Synopsis:
Demon god and 72 demon lords appeared in desolate era, annihilating and threatening different race's lives, the dark era was full of anarchic lands, small tribes and small kingdoms but nothing could stand in their way, except for one
The hero appeared and after heaven-shaking battle the victor was decided, demon god and his suboordinates were sealed, never to disturb humanity again
Millions of years have passed and this story turned into nothing but legend, nothing but unbeleivable history, however, the time has come, the seal is weakening, the day when they free themselves from chains of eons is approaching
And then a human appears, nameless, clueless, feeble, he just strives to survive, little does he know that further he goes, the more damage he deals to formation, but it's not enough, human is too weak, doomsday is inevitable
Will the new era bring heroes downfall or will they triumph over demons, regaining peace once again?
Only the time can tell
( Obviously I don't own the picture)

Title: The God of Lightning
Synopsis: The Lightning Clan lived in peace in the Divine Realm. But the peace didn't last for long when the demons began their assault on all the clans. On the brink of extermination, a baby was miraculously born. Giving their lives to activate their bloodline ability and a dimensional portal, the clan threw the baby into the portal, in hopes that it would one day grow strong enough to avenge their clan.

Title: The Assassin's Shadow
Synopsis: A man without a name or nation made his way in the world as an infamous assassin for hire. When a mission goes wrong and ends in his death, he finds himself in a place that wasn't his previous world. Determined to never go back to the life he once led, he tries to enjoy his life with his new family. Unbeknownst to him, fate seems to have a different plan.

Title: Magic Meets Reality; A VRMMORPG Novel
Synopsis: Two millenia ago, the Fae fled from Earth, chased by the relentless humans and their iron and steel. Now, they flee their new homes once again, found by the ever-pursuing Templar. Bast, along with thousands of the younger generation, are hidden in the most unlikely of places. Earth itself. And not just Earth, but inside a Virtual Reality game, Phasmia Online.Follow Bast, a genuine warrior and mage, as he enters a world that staggers his imagination. Giant beasts, seemingly endless people, and what are Levels and XP? Watch him use his years of combat training to gain a much-needed edge in a world filled with strange laws, and even stranger lore, battling his hatred of humanity, even as he struggles to comprehend the difference between Game and Reality.Warning: Novel contains mature themes, graphic imagery, sexual content, and plenty of feels for those that connect with the characters.

Title: Cheat shop
Synopsis:
The cheat was a databse or shop where everyother persons cheat in the future, past, and present is recoreded.
Lin has access to the shop and he can buy cheats from the shop.
This story will be told from Lins point of view.

Title: Sanguine War Era
Synopsis:
Selfish desires were born from the founding of the Eternal Source by the Empire of Alantieus. Desires that never should have existed until now. Suddenly spread its tendrils across the whole continent of Pacifia. The Emperors of Noct and Persidius were naught but puppets of greed. Led by their desires, they invaded the Empire of Alantieus with one goal in mind. To obtain the Eternal Source for themselves.  
Meanwhile, in the informative Nation of Peacius, was a young man by the name of Teiga Ura. His life was turned upside down when his nation fell victim to the desires. The Empire of Verserius annexed Peacius with utmost immediacy and added the people to its military ranks. With no freedom to choose, Teiga can only use his skills to survive a bloody war.

Title: History of Genesys
Synopsis:
This will be the place where i will post all the things that happen besides the main story I intent to post. Look at "Genesys" if you wanna know how that story is going if you are interested in the world. The main charakter there will be one of those Grounders, will be interesting maybe? dunno xD
Anyways I will start with the history of those people staying at the Genesys tree and continue onward from there on, may not be in one straight timeline always, and updates may not be regularly at times but I will try my best.
I just cant write a story without a history behind it, politics influencing the people and kingdoms and of course trying to get some speech idioms that will be based on the history of the continent. Dunno how good it all comes out but you will never know if you dont try xD

Title: I was Once the Demon King!
Synopsis: The world is in trouble and the people are praying for a hero to come save them! Fear not peasants! The Gods have answered your prayers! Who best to save the world than someone who know's how to destroy it? Now look! He's now re-born! Your new hero! The ex-Demon King!

Title: College Student To Chosen Hero
Synopsis:
This is the story of the person whose name is known throughout the world as the legendary general who faced death a thousand times, he is also known as the first true king and the uniter of lands.…..
This is the story of Bob.
Bob is a normal state university student, there is nothing really exceptional about him, no special talent, average grades, average looks and....  uhh well look everything in his whole aspect of being is average. And worst of all his daily life is absolutely normal.
Well What do you expect? he lives in our world. Nothing supernatural, magical, and "fun" ever happens in our world.
So thats why this story does not happen in our boring world.
Welcome to the continent where war and famine is as natural as the air that you breath and this is the place where the legacy of Bob will unfold.

Title: Blank: a Story of Good Intentions
Synopsis:
Many Millennia ago in a time of peace and innovation, a disaster of epic proportions, known as the Great Reverse, ravaged the world. The details remain vague, but humanity was once again thrown into the disorder and chaos. Under the mysterious circumstances, they reclaimed an ability that was once long lost to them, the restored ability to wield magic.
Thus a period of great prosperity and enlightenment swept over the world. With the help of magic, humanity reclaimed its throne above the world's other inhabitants and created civilizations almost as grand and extravagant as the kingdoms and republics of the past. But with every piece of innovation, arises a piece of chaos. The Great Reverse gave rise to horrendous and terrifying creatures. Not much is known about them, because their very nature makes them hard to study. It is believed that they arise from human turmoil itself. They have tangible bodies, but they're mercurial and erratic. Additionally their sole purpose of life is to instill despair within the world. They are those who walk through the night with no soul, no heat, no individual thought.
The story follows siblings Tom and Sally Blanc, who train to become slayers, or 'Knights' and quickly learn the hardships of their line of work.

Title: Falling slowly.
Synopsis: A conquest, a ambitious king, a small mountain nation that sits between the king his future empire.

Title: Witnesses Speak
Synopsis:
In a semi-utopian universe with people living in upmost comfort there are only few that go out of their way to murder and steal. 
Most of them are not threatening everyday life, but there are a few that are powerfull enough to cast fear in people's minds. Most powerful of them being Adalie. 
Our main character-Arnold unfortunately encounters her. She decides to spare his existence but transports him into a world full of war, a crippled world, our world. 
The year is 1939 and WW II has just started. He was reincarnated as a soldier with special abilities. He can still use magic, but his existence in our world comes at a cost. Every time he dies he is reborn as a soldier in a random nation. Those who were once his comrades may now very well be his enemies...
Image was taken from Google images. If you are the author of this image and want to take it down, please message me.
There may be some historical inaccuracies due to compromisation for the plot progression. Also due to the nature of this fiction, the historical genre will shift more into alternative history.

Title: Otherworld
Synopsis: A man from an advance version of Earth was abducted by a race of mysterious squid-like aliens just as he was about to die.Using their technology, the aliens sent him to be reborn in a different universe.A universe where monsters and magic are real but little did he know that an impending crisis approach this universe, a crisis so great that calling it fighting against the very force of nature-or even the universe isn't  an overstatement

Title: the AMAZING stick block-man
Synopsis:
block-man's fantastic, incredible, glorious, amazing, jaunt through the digital world of PINEAPPLE THUNDERCRACK, the greatest virtual-reality game to ever grace this Earth. YOUR ADVENTURE! your story begins before the game is released, and you will soon become one of the first players. perhaps, even, the GREATEST.
*Satire.

Title: LitRPG Novel
Synopsis:
Live at Amazon. Enjoy. Thanks again, RRL faithful...

Title: The Failing Girlfriend and the Unapproachable Boyfriend
Synopsis:
Lina is what her two friends call a Record Breaker Exer, simply put, she can't seem to ever find a partner that she can click with in the long run, and after her newest attempt left her with 30 failed relationships to her record, her friends make a game of her love life and tells her that she needs to make the next person they pick her boyfriend no matter the costs. Lina objects adamantly to this, but she's still pulled along for the ride.
By the end, the one chosen is the tall and unapproachable male student of the same class that one of her friends chose, and to make it better, Lina only has 2 years to make the relationship work. Will this romance end like her old ones or will the MBX (Mysterious Boyfriend X) as her friends secretly call him, turn to be the lucky 31st man to get out of her trainwreck of a past love life.
 
 
PS: this is something I plan to do, I'm not sure if it's any good or if I'll keep updates with it, however if it's well recieved, then I'll at least make a few following chapters and make it a decent short story.

Title: Crossroads
Synopsis:
2 paths. 1 crucial decision. 
Melanie, who is a freshman in high school, has a nightmare one night that lets her see her current path in life, and a second alternate path. One path is her life with her current high school boyfriend, Bryan. The other path is if she hadn't met him at all. Melanie reaches a crossroad after viewing her two possible futures and is forced to choose which life she wants more.

Title: Galaxy point
Synopsis: On year 3647 earth faced catastrophic situation when The sky tore apart and we're suddenly invaded by creatures enveloped in shadow. They swarmed earth like viruses and in less than 30 days more than 70% of life on earth was lost. When all hope was lost, a radiant beam of light shone up on earth, spiriting away the survivors and at the same time annihilated the shadow Aliens. Before I blacked out, I found a message in my head that felt as if it was giving me a mission. Before my last string of consciousness that held on through hell for weeks swept away, all I remembered of the message was we are being given a chance to fight so that we can be powerful enough to protect our home and our galaxy, for the shadow aliens will come back. As for what made life on earth almost extinct was nothing but a tiny scout for the main force that is yet to come.

Title: SEALED DUNGEONS ANOMALY
Synopsis:
"In the beginning there was only Death. For millions of years Death has ruled over eternal darkness spanning across all known universe. His influence is untarnished for no one is present to challenge his authority. Then came Life. In majesty and glory, it towered over all of the presence of death so that whenever the Light of life shineth, the Darkness of death could not prevail. Today, darkness is powerless against the influence of light. However, never did Death accepted defeat. It held all its powers awaiting for the time when its former glory could return." 
- Death and Life, Chapter 7
= = = = = = = = = = = = =
I'll update after I finish a chapter.

Title: Adventures of Faven
Synopsis:
Vereth was one of the strongest and most knowledgeable mage in the world. Unfortunately, in the midst of a war waged between multiple of the strongest faction, he was betrayed and killed by those he had considered to be his closest friend.
In a turn of fate, he finds that he has been reborn as Faven, who was had been bullied all his life because he was considered trash, and had finally drowned himself in despair.
Now with a new body, Vereth is determined to rise once again as one of the strongest mage in order to take revenge on the one who betrayed him, and to return to those that cared for him.

Title: (Published) Xtreme Manly Man Force of Intense Badassery
Synopsis:
Author Note:
The series has been greenlighted by a publisher! Yes, really!
https://www.royalroad.com/amazon/B0BWLDZ6S7
In light of this, I'm pulling the fiction from Royal Road for the time being. If anything changes you can expect to see it back up on here, but for the meantime, expect to see Xtreme force in ebook, print, and audiobook editions!
All questions and comments can be snuck into my inbox. Love you crazy bastards.
The best,
Kell Inkston (kellinkston.com)

Badass Men of the One Million Realms Unite!
A murderous duo of badasses, bound by the spilling of blood and seared in the fiery infernos of battle, angrily part company in search of man’s ultimate holy grail, The Fountain of Testosterone. Rick Durenor, a stoic mercenary, lives up to his nom de guerre– Ultra Death Graveman, while his former partner and kinda-but-not-really friend, Heart Tearer Outer, seeks revenge for a perceived slight that launches both men down a path that neither may return from.
The quest is noble; a crusade intended for only the manliest of men, set against the backdrop of evildoers, men with spiders for heads, crazy dudes with buzzsaws for arms, and those are the nicer guys! Allegiances are never sure on the road to absolute testosterone driven power. Just as Graveman forms a band of fierce followers, doubts are raised and trusts are questioned. The bottom line in this fantasy, sci-fi adventure is ‘cover your own ass’ – death is coming, and it's probably yours.
Lock and load, raise those fists and move over, bitch: Xtreme Force punts pussies to the curb and dispatches an all-out assault to deliver death, screaming, disgusting misogyny, and virile, ultra-erect audacity. Don't listen to your mom when she tells you to clean your awesome room, don't say "excuse me" when you leave the dinner table, and brush your teeth only once a day. This is the way of men.
Will our badass heroes reach the legendary FOUNTAIN OF TESTOSTERONE, or will they DIE?! Hell fuckin' yeah they will. They'll die AND they'll reach the fountain, because both of those things are manly as fuck. You doubtin' these boys? Shit, kid; you're trippin'.
Oh yeah, and it's definitely not satire, so don't come in expecting social commentary or any other form of meaningful metaphorical dialouge, ya' nerd-ass-dork-butt-wiener-face.
Updated every few days.
(Also https://kellinkston.com/ is where you can get your hands on some more radical fictz. You best show up or I'm giving up your seat to Greg, and we both know you like spare ribs and beer more than that square, so get over there and have a radical cookout with your Crazy Uncle Kell.)

Title: Jinsei no Hineri (The Twist of Life)
Synopsis:
Katsura Yuki is a very frail girl, most of her life she had lived inside her room in the hospital with only her nurse and doctor as the only family she considered.
She soon died due to her illness and after a month of her death she was reincarnated into the body of a baby boy, Yukimura Sei.
Now Yuki is living her/his life as Sei but past doesn't disappear even after your death.

Synopsis: Nothing

Title: Pretty sure i am not the main character
Synopsis: Do you hate hero's stories, where the MC have many awesome things, like pretty girls, or powerful power, and fate to save the world? Simply, do you hate these MC? If you do, you find the wrong place, if you don't you also find the wrong place. Simply, it is the wrong place to expect there is a main character at all. Noland, a simple man, as billion of people, is same as you and me, there is no fate for him, if he dies, nothing pretty much change. He lives a simple life until, he was summoned to another world, worse, face the final boss, the Demon Queen of Abyss, the second he was summoned into the unknown world. And on the hologram panel, he is identified as a glitch, accidentally summoned to the world. When he thinks nothing can be worse since he isn't destined to be a hero, his stats are almost useless and he has no power. And what else can be worse, the World put a curse on him to prevent him from affecting their plan. His curse is " You can never be the main character". How he can finish his first quest without getting killed.

Title: Diasori Dynasty: The World's Last Heroes
Synopsis:
In the world of fantasy, children are born with the ability to become a warrior, mage, and thief. When you become three you have to take a test to see what class you are and then you start training in that class.
Chen Diasori, a man who has been reincarnated to this strange world accidentally merged his body with two other people who had the ability to become a warrior and thief while he already had the ability to become a mage.
So when the world was introduced to a child not with two but all three classes, all of the seventeen kingdoms starts fighting for him.
Chen however doesn't have any plan of helping any one of them since considering the way he died was by betrayal.
What will happen to Chen in the future, read more to join his adventure and story.

Title: The Scarlet Rain
Synopsis:
“I live in a world where gods and goddesses exist. A world in which kingdoms wage constant wars against one another. My reality is your fantasy. My existence is a myth. My life is a legend. I am the beginning and the end.”
 
Seven primordial gods.
Seven kingdoms.
Seven promised swords.
Seven chosen humans.
 
The Great Selection is coming. Swords will clash and lives will be sacrificed to attain the greatest power of all, the infinite Power of the Universe. Three thousand years ago, a girl from the small Kingdom of Solaria summoned Chaos and obtained the power to rule over all domains.
Now, the time has come to call upon that great power once more. To save the world from its impending doom, Chaos decided for a death match. Seven humans from each of the seven kingdoms are chosen to fight until the end. Only one can obtain the Power of the Universe and only one kingdom will be saved.
A long forgotten secret buried in centuries old sheets of ice, an ancient curse, an age-old plot of revenge, and a thousand years of love will be revealed in this action-filled, romantic fantasy thriller, The Scarlet Rain.

Title: Solo Flight
Synopsis: When Albert prepares to set out for the first solo flight across Elf light-66 All seems ok.... or is it?

Title: Demon Queen's Life
Synopsis:
Hmm…Where to begin…Oh right I haven’t introduced myself. My name is Lina Wright well that’s my name now anyways my old name was Derek Brown…Yeah I reincarnated…into a flipping girl…whelp here’s my story before I reincarnated and after.
Auther Note: this is my first story so at first the storyline might be a bit off so if you guys can help in your reviews and please bare with my story please and thank you for the support

Title: The Legend of Bert
Synopsis: Kiden is a young boy, haunted by his parents' deaths. Coming home to his supposedly empty house, a man is sleeping in his kitchen. The man has dark robes and a big scythe, resembling the grim reaper. But this was no grim reaper, this was a Prime God, here to recruit Kiden into his ranks. Join Kiden as he discovers the realm of Gods, and uncovering the legend of Bert.

Title: abandoned
Synopsis: Endless wastes of smoldering deserts covers the horizon, the world abandoned by its makers slowly burns towards its end. Beneath endless sands lies a fragment of lost civilization spanning for miles and more. Among its ruins the few creatures still living tenaciously struggle with their meaningless lives as they strive to survive another day. Unsuspectingly the gears of fate started rolling at this forsaken place......

Title: Wraith-touched
Synopsis:
A friend,
A warrior,
A leader.
Ranvarius was known as many things in his life, ranging from the hopelessly energetic boy down the road up to the right hand man and travelling companion of the God-hero, Aros, himself.
He was a man who devoted himself into whatever he believed in and gladly joined the hero's side when he was beckoned. He was the one who helped paved the way for the future of the world, even gladly giving away his life when the time called for it.
Collapsed, bleeding and dying in a field filled with corpses and shattered steel, he held whispered his only regret to himself, a regret that will change the future of the world he fought for.
Author's notes: So this will be an attempt of mine to create a story. Constructive criticism will be greatly appreciated, after all, I do want to improve.
Releases may vary from a few days to a few weeks, because of my schedule.

Synopsis:

Synopsis: Our story follows Kellan Flint, a boy who was transported into a dungeon in another world. In this medieval-like world, strength means everything, the weak are trampled on. Follow the story as the once weak boy becomes stronger. Will he be able to unearth the secrets of this world, and the reason behind his prophetic dream and summoning.

Title: Project Perfect Order
Synopsis: Set in the 2nd cold war. The year is 2019. A attack in Switzerland ushers in the new 21st century. The shadows become battlegrounds. 2 factions at each other's throats. Ghosts of the past come back to life. And the war for who controls the shadows and geopolitical world begans.

Title: The True Heavens
Synopsis: Be it gods , devils or even heaven itself nothing can stand above me! If even the heavens oppose me, I shall oppose the heavens! I shall tear apart this Injustice! The heavens will not dominate me! I am the freedom seeker! I am the avenger! I am Jian Yu!

Title: The Development
Synopsis: My name is Lu J King, everyone calls me by my nickname LuJay. I got a message one day tell me that I would be abducted off the planet, asking me what super powers and magic I wanted in a multiple choice format while also telling me to simultaneously to fuck off. At times, the choices gave me hope, and other times it would get me into so much trouble. I’m not an emo, but this emotional rollercoaster wasn’t something I was expecting. I don’t miss home, I ruined my own family because of my own greed. I had everything I ever wanted, then one day I lost it all and became a hermit on Earth. On this new planet, I started off as a hermit… Well I just started this escapade. Join me in this game-like fantasy world filled with magic and monsters.

Title: Being chased by the heroes because I am a Master Puppeteer.
Synopsis:
Even though it wasn't bad, she hoped that her ability was more combat like heroes' ability. But what she didn't know after she wished that, she became a Master Puppeteer and turned the Demon King into her puppet collection. With that being said, she was forced to run away because of her stupid lucks.
Her title was ?Outsider? that forced her to leave the kingdom after 30 days she was summoned into the another world. Her job class was a?Puppeteer? that was based on her hobby. Her body went through a tremendous change and she who was a mid age woman with 180 cm tall became a loli with white hair because of the frequent mana explosion she caused. Since it has been like that, she decided to be positive and became a gothic lolita that she couldn't be in the past. 
And at the end of the day [not exactly], she was chased by the divine heroes because of the Demon King that she has subdued.
[JP-Style Novel] Isekai-ish novel. No Harem. Other tags: Kingdom Building, Slaves, Weird Luck Protagonist. Some slapstick jokes and gags, with a bit of puns because I like it. 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Read this before reviewing.
You can gave me a review and be savage about anything including grammar. But, just fyi. I'm only doing this for fun and have no intention on becoming pro. I just wrote because I wanted to read such a genre and plots because of the lacks of the novel of the similar genre and plots. Ah, but about my grammar... Even if you asked me to do something about it, it wasn't extremely bad plus I didn't have grammar editor, so I can't do anything about it.

Title: A Forbidden Contract
Synopsis:
The year is 2078, as technology advances the world is eventually autonomous with no one needing to work. VR Gaming is the most popular entertainment in the world. Our 'Hero', Greg, sets out to play one of the newest games; The game known as Conquest: A Time Of Need. It is pictured as one of the best games of magic and swordplay.
'As the world stabilizes will you become a Tyrant King, or even a Court Wizard? Only those brave enough can control the future.'
Greg wants to just be a decent living being, but can he stay out of all the conflicts going on in the game?

Feel free to give me any criticism or suggestions for the future.

Title: Out of the Blue
Synopsis:
Spring: the chrips of the birds, the blooming of the flowers, and the gentle patter of the rain. Ah, what a beautiful time of the year! When students look forward to the coming summer vacation, when lovers rejoice under the sprouting trees, and when monsters rampage across the planet, but of course this would be autumn in the southern hemisphere.
Thus is the peaceful life of our protagonist shattered as game like elements and otherworldly denizens intrude upon an unsuspecting Earth. Armed with nothing but his modern sensibilities and urban constitution, he will have to face a world brimming with encounters - both monstrous and otherwise.

For those who are confused, this is one of those RPG Apocalypse stories.

Title: The King Of Mercenaries
Synopsis: he is the king of mercenaries who wants to live a normal life but cant..........

Title: My Mythical Odyssey
Synopsis: Lost in a mythical forest as a soul with no thought or mind, our MC bumps into a mysterious man who, seemingly pleased with our MC, gives him a second chance at life. The soul of our MC turned into an egg then born as a white wisp wakes up in a strange forest with very little memories of a past life that seems so distant and far. As our MC starts his journey what strange encounters will he come upon and what destined meetings will he have?

Title: The Orderly Powergame (Dodeca's Short Stories)
Synopsis:
These are short stories, but they take place in the same universe following the same time line. This is a line of events of a powergame and its effects. Each chapter has a new perspective, no perspective is repeated. Thus every character whether main or background only gets one chapter.
Since I realized that I really like making short stories, I thought I would make a collection of them at one place instead of just spamming standalone fictions onto the website and having about seperate 121 fictions in a year when they're only just short stories ranging from 400-2000 words. If you're into short stories, drama, the harsh yet sweet part of reality and really, really like watching people suffer, then boy do I have the short stories for you!

Title: The New Trimension
Synopsis:
Ok this is my second time writing all of this sorry if anything is spelled wrong or just rushed but I was little angry I had to write it again. After all the words just disappearedHave you ever wondered what the definition of evil is I have. I never actually saw something as being evil. I actually believe there is no such thing as evil. I'll give you an example of what people call evil . If I walked into a bank pulled out a gun and said give me the money would be labeled as evil or bad. But If I a cop walked in and shot me he would be labeled as a Good
The way I see is that there is no such thing as evil or god there is only what man perceives as evil or good. Well sorry for the lecture but this story is about me so I can can talk however I want really. Ok you may be asking what this story is about well this story is about how I became the harbinger of evil the bringer of destruction The killer of millions ect there's a lot of nicknames. I'm gonna write a book about how I rose up In power well actually my freind dj is gonna write it but whatever .... Ok well the years 2056. We have flying cars and other things. All the cool crap. My real name is stax. As of right now let's skip some details up until we get to the real story . Basically I'm playing a virtual reality game call The New Trimension. Or T.N.T for short .
This is a fairly new game it's set in a different dimension where people actually have super powers you can play as a super villain or good guy you can be a while lot of different races there's a lot of things you can do well I'll just explain everything once you get into the story see you there hopefully lol.

Title: The legend who ran faster than the gods
Synopsis:
Life is filled with twists and turns and however dull it may seem to you, it becomes a story to another. Follow our protagonist as she finds her feet in her dark magical medieval world, and discovers the hidden beauty to life, making unexpected friends through fate and fortune, misery and terror, adventures and hardships. While this story attempts to bring out unique flavours and ideas, it lightly touches on a few traditional tropes with a refreshing breeze. This is a story of a girl's chaotic journey through life as she makes lifelong friends, growing up physically, magically and emotionally, and eventually comes to discovers her talent-to run fast, faster then anyone in recorded history.
Author's note: Although I've written (and not posted anywhere) several stories, this is my first story where I have really felt come out brilliantly plot wise (you be the judge) and posted (so far). I'm still new to the literary industry so I hope to recieve much feedback, and will attempt to incorparate any valuable feedback I receive. Depending on my writing pace for this series (I want to keep the quality relatively high) , I may release a second series which is also a historical fantasy (funny enough) that goes around breaking the fourth wall, being funny, while attempting to break cliches and surprise the audience.
P.S. Sorry if my naming scheme is cringy...not very good at naming things... Tags may also be unreliable. The prologue as a whole may not be a good representation for the story, so don't judge a book by its cover-although the cover is pretty good. The story starts off a bit dark, but it gets less dark further on...at least that's what's planned. Also, bonus points if you can see the hidden object in the cover and comment what it is. It was photoshopped into the cover with 15% transperency. There are also some typos in earlier chapters that I haven't gotten around to fixing...please bear with it. If you want a better judge of the series, read one of my later/recent chapters. They're quite a bit better.

Title: A little bit of Villainy
Synopsis:
Our world has become an apocalyptic wasteland where the only law is that of the strongest. In this nightmare, a band heroes rise up to save the remnants of humanity from itself.They build a great city to shelter the weak, only for the city (and all its inhabitants) to get blown to pieces by what many would call a villain.  
All the heroes die in the explosion but the goddesses of light and order transport their souls to a fantasy universe where they need to vanquish the demons and save humanity. The heroes succeed and 'peace' returns. These acts left the goddess of Chaos dying and as you all know desperate times call for desperate measures. 
"The only thing that can defeat a hero is a villain and luckily I know where to find one, one that has already killed them once." , -The goddess of chaos
The Villain that once bested the heroes gets revived as a Dracolich, an undead dragon of great power, and brings with him a storm a Chaos and Fun.
"I can't really say I won against them in our last life since we all ended dying in that explosion, but this time I'm gonna win our fun little rematch."- Villain 

This story is about a Villain who just wants to have a good time and maybe create a little mayhem.
Note: I know I tagged this story with an anti-hero lead tag, but that is only because there is no tag called villain lead.

Title: Flames Within the Heart
Synopsis: This is a story between Draco, and Warmth. Their love forbidden, and dangerous the more they fall in love.

An Enigma's Journey
Synopsis:
A Peculiar Journey .

Title: Universe Tournament
Synopsis:
The races aren't ready for what is to come.
Their Universe is on the brink of falling apart.
Fortunately, the beings that watch over it are mercifull.
"Let's save them !" they said.
"Let's help them !" they said.
"Let's play a game !" they said.
If the rumbling of the sea wasn't enough to make me think that something bad was going to happen, the deep masculine voice who resonated everywhere in the world completely steeled my doubts : We are in deep shit.
 
-----------------------------CONTENT WARNING-----------------------------All the scenes may contains some excessive violence, gore, swearing, traumatising and sexual contents. Read it at your own risk.
